templates.name: I signed up for the Birthday Bonus but I didnât receive it?
templates.content:
In order for you to receive your birthday bonus on your birthday, you must register your birthday at least 30 days prior to your birthday. If your birthday falls between the day that you registered and the 30 day waiting period afterwards, you will receive your birthday bonus 30 days after your registration. This delay is only applicable for the first year that you signed up.

All successive birthday bonuses will be emailed to you on your birthday. If you register your birthday through your rewards account any time after it has passed in the current calendar year, rewards will not be added to your account until the day of your birthday in the following year.

If it has been more than 30 days since you registered for your birthday reward and you still have not received the additional points in your account, please contact cs@truereligion.com and we will be happy to assist you.

templates.name: When should I plant succulents outdoors?
templates.content: Outdoor planting times will depend on your climate. Spring and early fall are good seasons for planting in most regions, though summer planting is also possible in temperate climates. Try to plant in locations protected from extended periods of direct sun, particularly if temperatures exceed 80F. For fall planting, plant at least one month before your expected first frost date to give the plants time to establish roots.

templates.name: How should I store bully sticks?
templates.content:
We package and ship our bully sticks in zip-top bags that allow them to be re-used many times. This is a convenient way to store your purchase and to preserve the product for a longer period of time. Many customers also like to keep them in airtight containers. Keeping them in a neutral or cooler environment will help to avoid potential spoilage. 

Lastly, if your dog does not finish a bully stick in one sitting, simply stick the uneaten portion in an airtight container or back into the original packaging to maintain freshness.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my Metal watch bands?
templates.content: Metal watch bands will retain their beauty for a long time if proper care is exercised; however, occasional cleaning may be necessary as dust and dirt accumulate from everyday wear. To clean, first remove the metal bracelet from the watch, then use a soft brush and warm soapy water to clean the bracelet. Be sure to thoroughly rinse the metal bracelet with clear water and completely dry it before reinstalling it on your watch. If the bracelet cannot be removed easily from your watch and your model is classified as a 50-meter (or higher) water resistant model and has been properly maintained, you may wash the bracelet without removing it. If your timepiece is classified as less than 50-meter water resistant, or is not a water resistant model, we suggest you take your watch to your local jeweler or send it to the nearest Authorized Citizen Service Center for professional cleaning of the exterior.

templates.name: How do I reset the 5QS?
templates.content: There are two options, a soft reset, and a factory reset. To soft reset the keyboard, press and hold FN + TAB for 4 seconds. This restarts the keyboard firmware and is the equivalent of unplugging the keyboard. To hard reset the keyboard, press and hold FN + TAB for 10 seconds. This will put the keyboard into factory reset mode and all LEDs will turn off. The LEDs will then blink yellow in a loop: R-E-S-E-T-?, where the Y key is illuminated red, and the Esc key is illuminated blue. Holding the Y key for 4 seconds will clear the NVRAM and pressing Esc or any other key exits factory reset mode.

templates.name: How do I clean my traveler?
templates.content:
We recommend rinsing out your Traveler bottle and lid under warm running water after each use. You can also wash your Traveler in the dishwasher. Note, however that harsh detergents and hot water may affect the appearance of your bottle over prolonged use. The Traveler lid is top rack dishwasher safe.

Should you not want to put your Traveler in a dishwasher, the exterior of the bottle can be cleaned using warm water and dishwashing liquid and a soft cloth. The interior of the bottle can be cleaned using dishwashing liquid and then rinsed thoroughly. You can use baking soda and water paste to remove coffee stains.

templates.name: Copper-infused mattress topper benefits
templates.content: There are so many reasons to fall in love with a copper-infused topper. They're breathable, provide temperature regulation, and they're an excellent option for protecting against mites, bed bugs, and lingering odors. But that's not all. A copper topper's antibacterial and antimicrobial properties protect against all sorts of undesirable microbes that build up over time, including viruses, mold, and fungus. For people with asthma or those who suffer from allergies, copper-infused mattress toppers are great choices.

templates.name: What is the difference between CVD CVD-grown diamonds and HPHT HPHT-grown diamonds?
templates.content:
The HPHT (high-pressure, high-temperature) Process gives an extra boost to
the diamond color, and usually, the clarity grade can be higher, but this type of growth
won't test as a natural diamond with the carbon test. The CVD-grown (chemical vapor
deposition) is the most popular technique, with the closest look to a natural diamond,
and 99% of the time, it will pass the carbon test.

templates.name: Are your compression socks medical grade compression socks?
templates.content:
In order to qualify for the "medical grade" rating, a sock's compression level must be 30 mmHg or higher. Our compression socks fall at the 18-25 level, which is considered "moderate level" compression and sits below the medical grade rating.

Moderate level compression socks like Wellow compression socks are intended for lowering the risk for severe conditions such as Deep Vein Thrombossis (DVT), blood clots, varicose veins, and spider veins. Our socks can also be used for reducing minor swelling, recovering from hard workouts, lowering leg and foot swelling during pregnancy, helping with minor injury recovery, and reducing leg fatigue from walking, standing or sitting for long periods.

templates.name: Instructions for gel polish manicture
templates.content: It's basically like regular Nail Polish, but you'll also need a UV lamp to cure. First, sanitize your hands, push back cuticles and remove shine from nails by using a fine drill bit or 150 grit file. Shape your nails with a 180 grit file, and using a lint-free wipe, clean the nail with alcohol. Apply a thin layer of Gel Base from the cuticle to the free edge, capping the tip. Using a LED light, cure for 30 seconds, or use a UV light to cure for 1 minute. Using gel polish color of your choice, apply a thin layer from cuticle to free edge. Be sure to cap the tips of the nail to ensure complete coverage. Cure for 60 seconds with an LED light or 2 minutes with a UV Light. Perform steps 3-4 again for each nail, and each nail should have 2 layers of gel polish. Apply a thin layer of Tack Free Gel from cuticle to free edge, and remember to cap the tips. Cure for 60 seconds with a LED light or 2 minutes with a UV Light. Then, apply Cuticle oil to the skin surrounding the nail to have a complete, nourished, and calcium-enriched gel polish manicure.

templates.name: How long do the grillz last?
templates.content: Our premium solid style premade grillz are made from a base of stainless steel and plated utilizing the ion plating process, so they'll last a long time. Our premium cluster grillz however, are made from a base of brass, but we also utilize the ion plating process for the same long lasting plating. The non premium premades are typically made using a base of jeweler's brass and a heavy gold plating. The gold plating usually lasts for years, but it's highly dependent on the frequency of usage and how it's cleaned and taken care of.

templates.name: Can I use a pad with wings with my Ruby Love? What do I do with the wings?
templates.content: Yes, Ruby Love works with pads with wings, too. Though it has an already built-in absorbent liner, additional pads can be added for more protection. Remove the adhesive release paper and keep wings folded under, as if you weren't going to use them or smooth them along the inside of the dri-tech mesh gusset. Press pad firmly into the Ruby Love gusset, and pull the dri-tech mesh around the edges of the pad. Smooth with your hand until the pad is flat. Then pull your Ruby Love style up snugly to your body. For proper protection, change your pad with regular frequency.

templates.name: Can I ride off-road?
templates.content:
Yes, absolutely! Rhinos are great on a variety of off-road tracks and terrain, thanks to their fat tires, front suspension (currently included as a complimentary upgrade), different ride modes, and 2-piston hydraulic brakes. 

Before riding off-road, remember to check your State and local laws and regulations as some laws differ for on-road and off-road riding. If you're taking your Rhino off road a lot, you will need to take extra care with regular cleaning and maintenance to ensure you can get the most out of your bike for years to come.

templates.name: What is a hybrid car?
templates.content: A hybrid car is a car that combines electric power with a gasoline engine to offer drivers improved fuel efficiency and performance. In the context of greenhouse gas emissions and fuel economy, hybrids use fewer fossil fuels and reduce emissions compared to a similarly powerful gas vehicle.A hybrid car supplements the gasoline engine's output with a battery and electric motor. Thanks to simplicity and efficiency of the electric motor, a hybrid can reduce fuel consumption and CO2 emissions by up to 35% - a significant improvement.

templates.name: Where should Revaree be stored?
templates.content: We recommend storing Revaree in a cool, dry place. Please note that Revaree begins to melt at 86 degrees - and though we send them with ice packs during the warmer months, in cases of extreme heat those ice packs unfortunately don't provide quite as much protection as we'd like. We recommend that you remove Revaree from any heat as quickly as possible - but if the product has been exposed to heat for a prolonged period and has started to melt, you can place the box inside your refrigerator, standing upright with the logo facing you (not upside down).

templates.name: Voluminous Curls/Cascading waves/Convertible base - How do I change the barrel?
templates.content:
Turn the heat all the way off by pressing and holding the Power & Temperature Switch. Hold the tool by the handle with the barrel pointing up. Push the locking mechanism (the rose gold stand in the middle of the tool) to the left until the dot lines up with the "unlock" icon - you will hear a "click". Then pull the barrel out.

To insert a new barrel, line up the three side pins in the barrel with the slots in the handle and insert the barrel firmly into the handle. Then turn the locking mechanism to the lock position-  you will hear a "click".

templates.name: What are the differences between a semi-float axle and a full-float axle?
templates.content: Great question! A semi-float axle rides on an outer bearing, thus supporting the weight of the vehicle. In semi-float applications the wheel is bolted directly to the axle. A full-float axle is a housing type in which the axle doesn't carry the load of the vehicle and does not have the wheel bolt directly to it. Full-float axles bolt to a spindle, which ultimately drives the wheels. They can also be removed with the wheel still on the vehicle.

templates.name: How do I care for my candle?
templates.content:
For optimal burning, trim wicks to a Â¼ inch before each light to avoid smoking and overheating the glass. The first burn should be long enough for the surface layer to liquify to the edge to ensure even subsequent burns and prevent tunneling - we recommend 2 hours.

Always protect the surface on which the candle sits and keep out of draft. Do not burn for more than four hours at a time and do not leave unattended.

templates.name: What does "Very Good" condition mean?
templates.content: It means that it's in great condition for a used book. It has been read but has no easily noticeable damage to the cover, dust jackets should be included, all pages are present and undamaged (e.g., no creases or tears), there's minimal underlining/highlighting of text perhaps on a few pages, and no writing in margins. There's very minimal wear and tear. It may be a former library book, with usual treatments such as mylar covers, call stickers, stamps, card pockets, barcodes, or remainder marks.

templates.name: Why is my dog peeing next to the lawn?
templates.content: It's likely that it's time to replace the grass. Often, when the dog starts to go on the side of the grass, it means it's time to get a new one. It may be too smelly with their own odor. But that's a good sign because that means they're definitely using the DoggieLawn! If your dog hasn't used the lawn yet, I'd recommend watching our training vide for tips here: https://doggielawn.com/pages/training

templates.name: Are the patches reusable?
templates.content: Yes, our Smoothing Patches are reusable. With proper care, each patch can last around 10 uses. You can check out our "how to video" for detailed instructions: https://siobeauty.attn.tv/sl/Q3ZNX9-Y The best way to maximize the adhesion of your patch is to apply to cleansed, dry skin. Each morning after use, put your patch adhesive side down on the storage shield and keep the storage shield in a place away from dust. To cleanse the patch, rinse it with water and allow to completely dry before reapplying to skin or back onto the storage shield.

templates.name: Why do you use Jojoba seed oil?
templates.content: Harvested on an organic farm in the American desert, our extra virgin Jojoba Seed Oil is considered "Golden Grade". We use only the first press oil and we infuse it into all of our Hydraganic products. It is richest in antioxidants and the micronutrients that are best for skin. And we don't use any heat in the extraction process so that the vital nutrients of the Jojoba Seed are preserved, increasing the benefits when applied to skin. When studied at a molecular level, Jojoba oil was found to have the closest structure to the natural Sebum (oil) of the skin. Making it easy to absorb without clogging pores.

templates.name: What is shared data?
templates.content:
Shared Data functions as a "pool" that lets you share data between all of your Spartan cameras on a single plan. Instead of buying a plan for each camera, you can start with one camera on a plan, then add additional cameras. This eliminates the need to maintain multiple plans at the same time.

Every cellular camera from Spartan Camera requires data to send pictures and videos to your devices. With our new Shared Data Plan, sharing data between your cameras has never been easier! In addition, all Spartan Shared Data Plans come with Premium Service, so there is no need to purchase Premium Credits.

templates.name: How can Fast Bar support fasting if it contains sugar?
templates.content: Though Fast Bar contains about 5 grams of sugar, it's specifically formulated with plant-based fats and fibers that help to slow the absorption of sugars and reduce the glycemic index. The sugar in Fast Bar comes from honey, a natural and nutritious food. Thus, even though there's a small amount of sugar in Fast Bar, its design and composition keeps the body in fasting mode because it doesn't trigger a significant spike in blood glucose.

templates.name: What is the PivotÂ® Wine Preservation System?
templates.content: The Pivot Wine Preservation System is an exciting new wine preservation option that allows you to extend the life of your everyday wines.  For bottles you expect to finish over the course of days or weeks, the ingenious combination of the Pivot Stopper and the Device keeps the remaining wine fresh for up to 4 weeks ensuring the last glass is just as amazing as the first. The Pivot System is easy to use and works with any still wine regardless of closure type: natural cork, synthetic, glass, or screwcap. Simply open the bottle and immediately insert the Pivot Stopper.

templates.name: Can I use Purity Coffee beans for espresso?
templates.content: Yes, our beans are great for espresso brewing! Espresso refers to the brew method, not the roast. When selecting coffee to use for espresso, it's best to choose a medium-roasted blend, which our original coffee is. Our beans aren't oily, which is good - you should avoid oily beans when grinding for espresso. When properly dialed in, you should be able to pull a smooth and full bodied shot of espresso with great crema. To brew espresso you'll need to finely grind your beans and use a brewer which is made for brewing espresso.

templates.name: Volumizing Hot Rollers Luxe - How do I operate the rollers?
templates.content:
Press the Power & Temperature Adjustment Button to turn the hot roller on. The rollers are set to heat up to the high heat setting upon first use, indicated by 2 solid lights. To change the temperature to the Low heat setting, press the Power & Temperature Adjustment Button until the lights blink to indicate the temperature adjustment mode. When the Ready-to-Use indicators appear, the rollers are ready to use.

templates.name: Why are the flags backward?
templates.content: The flag is not actually backward but it is assaulting forward. It symbolizes carrying the flag into battle. This was traditionally done by a single person carrying the flag on a pole, and while running toward the enemy, the flag will trail behind. The flag is shown on military uniforms on the right arm, with the stars facing the enemy (indicating going towards, not running away), as if it were still on the flagpole from tradition.

templates.name: Difference between the S1.25 European plug and dual voltage ?
templates.content: The standard voltage in Europe is 220-240v and in the US it's 120-140v. If the device that is set to only one voltage is used in the other without a converter there's a possibility of frying the device (or worse). The 1.25 dual voltage can handle 100-240v so there are no worries about frying the device if you're traveling frequently to countries that use different voltages.

templates.name: How do I season my cookware?
templates.content:
Our cookware should be seasoned before the first use or after a deep clean. You do not need to season your pans before every use. To season your pans properly:

1. Heat your pan on medium-low
2. Spread 1 teaspoon of Vegetable, Avocado, or Olive Oil around the interior of the pan
3. Leave your pan on medium heat for 2-4 minutes

If you are ready to cook, feel free to use the pan right away. If you are not ready to cook, please let the pan and oil cool down before washing it out with warm soapy water.

templates.name: When can I expect to see results when using the Got to Grow serum?
templates.content: The Got to Grow hair serum can take 3-4 months to show results when applied as recommended, once daily. The hair growth cycle consists of three phases: anagen, catagen, and telogen. The Got to Grow serum can help support an environment for denser, stronger hair during these phases. Each individual circumstance may be different, but the phases in a hair cycle are the same. However, each user may be in a different hair cycle at the time of first use and may see results quicker than others.

templates.name: Are all limited slip differentials rebuildable?
templates.content: Some are and some aren't! Clutch-type LSDs, like our Dura Grip, can be rebuilt. Rebuilding involves replacing the clutches in the unit. The clutches can be replaced to bring the unit back to its original performance level, or non-stock clutches with different friction characteristics and springs with custom compression rates can be used to fine tune the Dura Grip's performance to better match the style of driving/racing you are doing. Gear-type LSDs, like our Spartan Helical, don't require rebuilding because there are no clutches to replace, there's nothing to rebuild. The unit's internal worm gears should last the life of your vehicle.

templates.name: What are the differences between the mini / perfect bound and the big planners?
templates.content:

The Big Planner has a weekly planning layout featuring a grocery list, meal planning, prayer intentions, to-do, and notes section. It also has a weekly layout with hourly daily breakdown with gratitude section and daily prayer checkboxes. 

The Mini and Perfect Bound Planner have a monthly planning layout featuring monthly goals for Faith, Family, and Fun, as well as prayer intentions, and notes section.  It also has a weekly layout with checkboxes for to-dos as well as "tonight's dinner" and gratitude section. The Mini has the gold coil binding, while the Perfect Bound is perfect bound.

templates.name: How do I clean and maintain Opus?
templates.content:
We recommend using a non-abrasive damp cloth to wipe down the exterior and load bin. The anti static technology will work best for about 60 cycles before it needs to be cleaned to operate at its peak performance. To clean it, remove the catch cup, and use the Fellow cleaning brush (or another cleaning brush such as a clean makeup brush or a clean paint brush) and "swipe" around the inside of the exit chute (where the coffee grounds come out). This will clean the chute and help the anti-static mechanisms work well. 

Take the load bin off, remove the outer burr, and brush the burrs with the Fellow cleaning brush.

templates.name: Product Suggestion for Keratosis Pilaris
templates.content: While our products aren't tested to cure and/or minimize Keratosis Pilaris symptoms, I would suggest trying our Silk Scrub: https://furyou.com/collections/silk-scrub/products/silk-scrub , which is an in-shower exfoliator that uses both chemical and physical exfoliants to gently remove dead skin. Harsh physical scrubs often irritate KP further, so this is a great alternative. If you'd like to try to see if it helps you, we have a 60-day trial policy where you can test and return any products purchased from our website within 60 days for a full refund even if the products have been opened, used, or have never been touched.

templates.name: Do LATHER products contain preservatives?
templates.content: Preservatives are a necessary part of grooming products. Without preservatives, creams and gels would become a breeding ground for microbes. Preservatives are used simply to prevent the growth of or destroy microorganisms that would otherwise damage our products and compromise their safety. We use a combination of natural and synthetic preservatives that are proven to destroy harmful bacteria, yet are gentle to the skin. All our products do not contain parabens, sulfates, synthetic fragrance, synthetic color or mineral oils.

templates.name: Can I use waterproof products to waterproof the leather?
templates.content: Most brands spray the exterior of the boot after it's made with a waterproofing solution which is why it wears off after a month or two. We waterproof by using a triple-layer system. We start by putting a waterproofing solution right into the leather as it's being tanned. Every seam on the inside of the boot is then coated with a waterproof sealant. Last, but not least, we embed a breathable membrane inside your boot that stops water from getting in but lets moisture out.

A new lid with leakproof security and a wide contoured lip are combined with our 18/8 double-wall stainless steel bottle to create the ultimate travel mug. templates.name: Is the Weighted Blanket appropriate for children?
templates.content:
We highly recommend that you consult your child's physician before your child uses a weighted blanket. When used correctly, weighted blankets are considered safe for most children, as long as the blanket is an appropriate size and weight.

When choosing or considering a weighted blanket for a child, it is generally best to look for one that is 10% of their body weight. For example, if your child weighs 100 pounds, a 10-pound weighted blanket would be most appropriate.

Then within 3-5 business days, they just appear at your door. We're forced to wait at least 5 business days (not counting weekends or holidays). After 5 business
days, if it does not show up please reach out to us, and we will make it right.

templates.name: How do I oil the Blade/do I need to oil the Blade? (Trimmer)

Under heavy use (eg. in barbershops), the trimmer may need to be oiled more frequently.

templates.name: Are your bottles and pitchers microwave safe?
templates.content:
Actives, Originals, Sport, and Traveler Stainless Steel bottles are not microwave safe.

Tritanâ¢ Bottles and Pitchers can be used in the microwave. Before using any container in the microwave, please remove the lid to allow ventilation. Remove the infusers and filters. Take care when removing the container from the microwave as contents and the surface of the bottle or pitcher will be hot.

Use caution when replacing the lid as the steam buildup can cause harm. It is advisable to allow the heated liquids to cool to a drinkable temperature before handling the bottle or pitcher. Overheating of any container in the microwave can be dangerous.

templates.name: Can I split the Ristela tablets?
templates.content:
We pre-score each Ristela tablet to make it easier to break them in half. If you find it difficult to swallow the whole tablet, you can take each tablet in halves instead.

You can also split up the time of day you take Ristela, meaning you can take one tablet in the morning and the other in the afternoon or evening, as long as you are consistently taking two tablets a day.

Alternatively, you can also crush Ristela and mix it into soft food or smoothies to make the product more accessible.

templates.name: Does The Boll & Branch Mattress sleep hot?
templates.content: The Boll & Branch Mattress was made with our customers' needs in mind, and that included designing it for a cooler night's sleep. When creating our mattress we selected the most natural, breathable materials to help promote airflow. These materials include: two latex layers (one infused with natural graphite) which pull heat down for a natural cooling effect, a breathable wool/poly blend layer to replace heat-retaining foam, and two layers of coils which enable air to pass through.

templates.name: "Direct to garment" products - care instructions
templates.content: Please wash before wearing. We recommend the first wash be done alone, with no other garments in your machine. Washing will remove any pretreatment that may have been used in the Direct to Garment process. Failure to wash your garment could result in permanent discoloration due to UV exposure. The pretreatment is used to bind the white ink of the design to your garment and is required in Direct to Garment printing. Machine wash cold, inside out with like colors on gentle setting the least amount of time. Tumble dry medium, don't iron, and don't dry clean.

templates.name: Is there a specific amount of time I should leave the Lightener on my hair?
templates.content: You can leave it on up to 50 minutes and then rinse out, shampoo and dry. We do suggest checking your hair after 30 minutes to see if you have achieved a high enough level of lift! If upon rinsing out the lightening kit you think you need to go even lighter, we suggest waiting 2-4 days and then lightening again. Be sure to monitor your hair closely as not to over process the hair. Since that would be your second time lightening, we suggest only leaving the lightening kit on for a max of 30 minutes and checking frequently.

templates.name: Source Showerhead - How do I replace the filter?
templates.content: Unscrew the top and bottom halves of the showerhead and remove the existing filter. Peel off the adhesive labels on the new filter and place it into the bottom housing of the shower filter. It doesn't matter which direction it's inserted into the housing. Screw the two halves of the housing together and reattach to shower pipe. Make sure to flush with hot water for 1 minute before showering.

templates.name: Why are lab grown diamonds so expensive?
templates.content: Diamonds, the Earth's most molecularly dense material, form naturally 100 miles below the surface in the intense heat and pressure of the mantle. Despite a century of research, creating them at the surface is energy-intensive, challenging, and expensive, particularly for large, colorless, and transparent crystals.

templates.name: How do I activate the powder? / My powder is not dispensing, what should I do?
templates.content: I'm sorry to hear your brush isn't dispensing for you. In order to get your brush fully activated, follow these steps. First, open the brush cap and remove the rubber band from around the bristles, then slide the sleeve back up over the bristles and put the cap back on. Next, bang the top of the brush on a hard surface, such as a tabletop 6-8 times. You'll want the brush sitting vertical (brush bristles facing down with the cap on) on the tabletop with the cap hitting the table. You'll want to use quite a bit of force when doing so (enough force to help release some of the air pressure in the brush's filter, so don't go easy on it). Once you perform this tapping method, remove the brush cap, slide back the sleeve and run your finger through the bristles so they bend and flick upwards. You should see a "poof" of powder. Once you see this, the brush is fully activated. If you don't see this, try repeating the steps by putting more force in it this time. The hard force is really the key in activating the brush as it allows for the powder to push through the filter.

templates.name: What is the difference between Nolah's Ultimate Adjustable Smart Base, Adjustable Base with Massage, and Adjustable Base with Headboard?
templates.content:
All three of our adjustable bases offer pre-programmed positions-including the neutral zero-gravity position-and the ability to program your own. They also feature wireless controls, under-bed lighting, and USB ports for convenience.

The Smart Adjustable Base is our most advanced model, featuring voice controls, massage motors, and wall glide technology that keeps you in line with your nightstand regardless of how far you incline the bed. Just a step down is the Adjustable Base, which includes massage motors and remote control, but not voice control or wall glide. Meanwhile, the Adjustable Base with Headboard features a built-in upholstered headboard. It offers the same wireless remote controls as our other two adjustable bases but does not have massage functions.

templates.name: What does glyphosate residue free mean?
templates.content:
Glyphosate is a hazardous herbicide used to kill weeds. The World Health Organization has labeled it a probable carcinogen. This harmful compound has also been shown to disrupt hormones, increase inflammation, and negatively impact gut microbiome. In other words, it doesn't belong near food (or on the planet).

The USDA organic certification will ensure a product is mostly free of glyphosate. But recent studies have shown glyphosate often makes its way into organic products at some point in the production process. The Certified Glyphosate Residue Free badge guarantees products are 100% free of glyphosate from beginning to end. It's one more way we are setting the standard ingredient purity.

templates.name: Why do you use FD&C dyes?
templates.content: Only some of our products use FD&C dyes. When formulating, we always start with a base of 100% natural dyes and supplement only as needed with FD&C dyes in order to achieve the bright and vibrant shades that we are known for. Natural dyes alone cannot achieve those shades. FD&C stands for Food, Drugs, and Cosmetics, meaning each batch has been tested and certified by the FDA for usage in those three delivery systems. Based on current research, we do not believe that utilizing FD&C dyes in tiny amounts as a supplement to natural dyes poses a health risk.

templates.name: Why is there a Warning 65 in your products?
templates.content:
The warning you see on our products is related to Proposition 65, which is a warning required on all supplements bought and sold in California. Our products are in fact sold in California, so we are required by law to add this label, as the ingredients in our products may contain trace amounts of the chemicals on their list. Most, if not all, supplements have this label on them. Those harmful ingredients can only be detrimental to your health at high levels. Luckily, all of our products are third-party tested to confirm no harmful chemicals are present, especially in dangerous amounts.

If you're ever curious about our reports, feel free to reach out to us, and we'll be happy to provide you with reports for the products you are planning to purchase and consume. These reports will provide a detailed description of each ingredient in the powder, as well as its amounts.

Please feel free to let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

templates.name: How long do electric car batteries last?
templates.content: The battery pack in an electric vehicle is made to last the lifetime of the vehicle. However, they do slowly lose the amount of energy they can store over time. This phenomenon is called "battery degradation." You can limit battery degradation by only using Level 3 charging infrequently, and reducing exposure to extreme temperatures.Battery replacements are vanishingly rare, with only about 1.5 percent of EVs needing actual replacements, and because of the long eight- or 10-year battery warranties, these replacements are generally covered by the manufacturer. Many manufacturers are now training technicians to repair faulty cells in battery packs instead of completely replacing them.

templates.name: Whatâs the difference between your oils and the big brands out there?

We pride ourselves on having the purest oils on earth. Our oils will either meet or exceed the big brand's quality. We source our pure oils directly and ethically from small farms in small batches, bottle them at our facility in Hingham, WI, and then sell the oils directly to you with no middle man. That's why we're able to charge so much less than a lot of other big essential oil companies, while still delivering stellar quality.

We are a family-owned business that is passionate about helping our customers create a toxin-free home. We are also a socially conscious brand, striving to be world changers by sourcing our oils ethically and by giving 13% of our profits to help end human trafficking.

templates.name: Who is the Weighted Blanket made for?
templates.content:
The Weighted Blanket is not intended for children 12 years old and under or weighing less than 100 pounds. We also highly recommend that you consult your child's physician before your child uses a weighted blanket. When used correctly, weighted blankets are considered safe for most children, as long as the blanket is an appropriate size and weight.

When choosing or considering a weighted blanket for a child, it is generally best to look for one that is 10% of their body weight. For example, if your child weighs 100 pounds, a 10-pound weighted blanket would be most appropriate. Additionally, do not puncture the weighted insert. If the insert with glass beads becomes torn or damaged, dispose of it immediately as it might become a choking hazard.

templates.name: Can I freeze your coffee beans and grounds to make them last longer?
templates.content: Yes, but make sure that they're in a vacuum-sealed bag. This can make the coffee last indefinitely if it's truly in an air-tight container. If you're only storing for a short amount of time, there's no need to freeze the coffee. Let coffee thaw for an hour after you pull it out of the freezer.

templates.name: How do I measure myself?
templates.content: Please measure your bust circumference at its fullest point, wearing a bra without padding. Stand with feet hip-distance apart and find the widest part around your bust. Then measure the circumference under your bust, around the rib cage where the elastic band of a sports bra would land. Be sure you do not "flare" your rib cage or suck in your breath. For both measurements keep the measuring the tape parallel to the ground and try not to pull the tape too tight.

templates.name: My item is pilling after washing it is that normal?
templates.content:
Because our products contain organic and recycled materials, we're unable to add anti-pilling agents/chemicals to them as they would no longer be classified as organic in some cases, and the agents used are often not environmentally friendly.

To help reduce the risk of pilling, we recommend that you wash your tentree garments inside out in cold water and hang them to dry. You may also want to look into using a sweater stone which can help you remove some of this pilling and give your garment more longevity.

templates.name: How is Anuschka different from any other hand painted accessories in the market?
templates.content: We're the only family-owned, designed, and ethically produced hand-painted brand. We offer original artwork and unrivaled quality at an incredible value. We are the premier, original hand-painted brand of hand-painted accessories available at select boutiques and shoe stores across 20 countries. Like every trend setting brand, we have our imitators, but we can assure you that our product speaks for itself as it has for more than 30 years. Each Anuschka is hand-cut and crafted from fine leather, then individually painted, not by professional artists, but by young men and women who have been trained by us and enjoy the benefits of our fair-trade policies. High grade leather, signature lining, branded hardware, original art, years of experience, and excellent quality distinguish us from the counterfeits. Even today, a family member does a final check of every bag before hand-signing it.

templates.name: How is your dog food made?
templates.content: With air-dried food, the ingredients are mixed together and moisture is removed from the product at a low temperature over a longer period of time. Because of this slow drying process, the nutrients are preserved (almost perfectly) and it remains highly palatable to dogs, unlike dehydrated or freeze-fried food which often need to be rehydrated for dogs to be satisfied. You can also find more information on our ingredients on our website here: https://fotp.com/food

templates.name: Can I use products from different collections?
templates.content:
Yes! You can mix and match Murad products, but you should only use two or more Step 2 treatments if the directions specify that you can. Traditionally, it is best to use one Step 2 treatment in the morning, and one Step 2 treatment in the evening. Murad products are labeled Cleanse | Tone (Step 1), Treat | Repair (Step 2), Hydrate | Protect (Step 3) and Boost (Step 4). Below are ways to use products from different lines: 

â¢ You can cleanse (1), treat (2), hydrate (3), and boost (4) 
â¢ You can cleanse (1), tone (1), treat (2), hydrate (3), and boost (4) 
â¢ You can cleanse (1), treat (2), hydrate (3), and then SPF (3)

templates.name: What's the difference between a shampoo bar and a liquid one?
templates.content:
In terms of packaging, the solid shampoo has FSC paper packaging, while the liquid one has a bio-based plastic one. Formula-wise, both the solid and the liquid shampoo contain Slow Food actives and have a high level of biodegradability, but the liquid one has a greater natural content. The Shampoo bar is perfect both for home-use and for travel-use. The liquid one, however, has 1-liter if you need to use it for your salon. 

Please note that no shampoo is perfect for all uses and under all sustainability profiles. Both the bar and the liquid can actually compliment each other! Hope it helps.

templates.name: What is âMilk Protein Concentrateâ?
templates.content: It's simply a by-product of micro-filtering the proteins from raw milk. What you get is concentrated protein (hence the name MPC). We use milk protein concentrate - paired with a small amount of tapioca starch - to ward-off the challenges of the supply chain, such as thawing/re-freezing and "heat shock". One of the great things about using MPC is that it allows us to reduce the sugar contents of our ice creams as milk proteins are naturally sweet!

templates.name: Is the packaging recyclable?
templates.content:
The Birch mattress is shipped in a cardboard box that can be broken down and recycled through your local recycling collection program. The box is not needed for any potential returns and can be discarded as soon as you have opened and set up your mattress.

The mattress itself is wrapped in two layers of a Low-Density Polyethylene. This material is considered a #4 plastic for recycling purposes and can be recycled at select stores and recycling centers where soft plastics are collected.

templates.name: What is Vegetable Tanning?
templates.content: Vegetable tanning is an intricate, traditional method of tanning leather dating back to approximately 6000 BC. It's an organic method relying on natural vegetable tannins from bark and other plant tissues. Vegetable tanning is a time-consuming process requiring highly skilled craftsmen. This tanning is better for our environment and allows us to explore new forms of wearable art by incorporating paintings and tooling along with our classic hand paintings. The resulting collection is a line of more structured leather bags with specially designed artwork.

templates.name: Why isnât my candle getting a full melt pool to the outer edges of the candle container?
templates.content: Most likely the cause of your candle not getting a good melt pool is the size wick you are using. Whether you're using a single wick or double-wicking your candles you need to make sure you're using an appropriately sized wick for the diameter of your container. For guidance, you can check out our Guide to Wicking to assist you in your selections: https://www.lonestarcandlesupply.com/candle-making/candle-wicks/guide-to-wicking Other causes could be too much fragrance or dye.

templates.name: What's the main difference between the iO series 9 vs 10
templates.content: Good question! All features of iO9 are available in iO10 but the iO10's magnetic charging stand has iO Sense Technology to give visual feedback (via multiple LEDs) on the brushing routine. Also, the iO10's pacer is often set to 20 second (sextant) intervals compared to the 30 second (quadrant) intervals of the iO9. Additionally, the iO9 has a power adapter hardwired into the charging stand and a separate, detachable, adapter for the power2go case. The iO10 has just 1 detachable adapter for both the charging stand and power2go case.

templates.name: I noticed that a lot of your products are currently out of stock, whatâs going on?
templates.content:
Great observation! Right now we are in a transition phase. If you've been around for a while then you will know that we previously had a lot of different products that were pretty generic.

They were very high quality, but they were still generic. This year we decided to make the switch and focus solely on supplements that are designed specifically for thyroid patients. So for example, instead of a general probiotic, we wanted to make the perfect probiotic for thyroid patients.

All of the changes you are about to see coming out are helping us to get to that goal. The focus of all of our supplements going forward will be on thyroid health and weight loss.

templates.name: Ceramic? How is it non-toxic? Aluminum Base? Chemical Free?
templates.content:
We have an aluminum core covered with multiple layers of non-toxic ceramic
coating to keep it locked in, as well as a stainless steel base and handles. Our
non-toxic ceramic non-stick coating is made from inorganic natural ingredients
which are all 100% safe to use in contact with all foods (and FDA approved).
Plus, the absence of potentially dangerous chemicals like PTFE, PFOA, PFAS,
Lead, and Cadmium means that there is no chance of toxic fumes or materials
leaching into your food, even if you accidentally scratch or overheat your pan.

templates.name: What are pressed pigments?
templates.content: Pressed pigments are pigments that are pressed directly into a pan. Unlike eyeshadow, shades that are marked "pressed pigment" are not intended for use in the immediate eye area. Pressed pigments are commonly found in vegan palettes, as they contain dyes that replace the carmine found in some non-vegan eyeshadow shades. Certain dyes found in pressed pigments may stain people with sensitive skin or when used in excess. These shades can be safely used anywhere else on your face. Try using a pressed pigment as blush or underneath your brow. Pressed pigment shades are indicated on a palette's product page as well as the palette's outer box.

templates.name: Can I use Scalp Serum if I have oily hair?

templates.name: Why should I purchase from you and not other brands?
templates.content: Unlike a lot of mattress brands out there, we offer a Sleep Quiz - https://helixsleep.com/pages/get-personalized to match you to your mattress based on your specific sleeping needs. Our quiz uses three key factors to match you to the best mattress: body type, feel preference, and sleeping position. Other brands typically have a "one-size fits all" model by offering one or few options for everyone. We highly recommend taking the sleep quiz to see which mattress should work best for you. Additionally, Helix is made in the U.S, using the best, durable foams and materials. Plus we offer a 10 or 15-year warranty, depending on the specific mattress. You can also take a look at our competitive comparison here - https://helixsleep.attn.tv/sl/xyXqzvaX

Additionally, when comparing the same item on different monitors or at different angles on those monitors, they will appear to be different colors. templates.name: If your products are made with aluminum, canât it still leach into food?
templates.content:
The concern with aluminum is the possibility of it leaching into food, and our aluminum core doesn't leach into food. It's covered with a multi-ply layer of non-toxic ceramic coating to keep it locked in. In the extremely unlikely chance you chip your pan through those layers to the core, and then still decide to cook with it again, you still won't get any toxic amount of leaching. 

We've had tests performed by SGS (The same company the FDA uses) regarding leaching, which have shown that we are so far under the safe limit levels set nationally that it barely records a number. If you'd like to see our test report on this, shoot us an email at help@carawayhome.com and we can send those right over!

templates.name: Does Aventure have both pedal assist & throttle?
templates.content: Aventon is equipped with both throttle and pedal assist features. Pedal assist (also abbreviated as PAS) is a feature that gives riders a boost of power, incrimentally, as they pedal. You can choose from 5 levels of pedal assist, ranging from minimal assistance to maximum. The throttle, on the other hand, gives riders a boost of power without the need to pedal. Ours operates on demand, meaning you can throttle from a complete stop! Aventure comes equipped with a thumb throttle which can propel you at speeds up to 20 MPH. It's important to note, that in order to throttle your Aventure on demand, you must be in PAS 1 - 5, the throttle will not operate in PAS 0.

templates.name: What are sulfates and what kind do you use in your products?
templates.content: Primarily used in shampoos, sulfates are a class of cosmetic ingredients known as surfactants, which act as cleansers. Some examples of commonly used sulfates include sodium lauryl sulfate and sodium laureth sulfate. Recent concern surrounding the harsh qualities of certain sulfates motivated us to ban sodium lauryl sulfate and ammonium lauryl sulfate from our formulations, both of which can over-cleanse the hair and scalp of its healthy natural oils and lessen the longevity of hair color. Instead, we formulate using sodium lauryl sulfoacetate, sodium lauroyl sarcosinate, cocamidopropl betaine, sodium cocoyl isethionate, and cocamide MEA, which are ultra-mild and highly effective surfactants derived from coconut oil.

templates.name: Do vegans use ARMRA Colostrum?
templates.content:
Yes, many vegans choose to use ARMRA Colostrum. Of course, this always comes down to personal preference. Colostrum is not vegan, as the first milk produced by all mammals, and the first nutrition we all receive in life to thrive, it is a dairy whole food, so would be considered vegetarian.

That said, India's spiritual leaders, the "Rishis", have included colostrum in their vegan diet for many thousands of years dating back to Ayurvedic practice, as colostrum has traditionally been considered in a class of its own - neither animal nor plant.

templates.name: Where do I mount the shock brain if the suggested location isn't available?
templates.content: If you're unable to mount the IIC unit in the designated area, we recommend choosing an area that has relatively good airflow and is away from high heat. The orientation of the board is critical, you must mount the control unit flat /level with the plugs facing the passenger side. The arrow must be pointing forward and the box must be close to level in the other directions. Calibration will compensate for some tilt as long as the arrow is forward. templates.name: What is the difference between Type 1 and Type 2 EV chargers?
templates.content: Level 1 and Level 2 EV chargers both operate on alternating current (AC) like you have in your home. Level 1 chargers plug into a 110-volt plug, like you'd plug your laptop into; therefore, they can only deliver about 3 to 5 miles per hour of charging - making them inconvenient for electric cars. Use Level 1 chargers only for plug-in hybrids. A Level 2 EV charger connects to a 220-volt outlet, like you'd plug your clothes dryer into. Depending on the electrical infrastructure, and the specific charger model, a Level 2 charger can deliver between 12 and 80 miles of charge per hour - making it a great fit for charging your EV at home.

templates.name: What are the results from your first Fast Bar study?
templates.content:
The Fast Bar study tested the effects of eating a Fast Bar at breakfast time (after a 15-hour overnight fast), compared to either skipping breakfast or eating a standardized breakfast bar. The study looked at blood glucose and ketone levels over the 4-hour period after breakfast time and showed that blood glucose levels in patients eating Fast Bar were nearly identical to blood glucose levels in patients who skipped breakfast.

Ketone levels over the 4 hours were also very similar in both groups. These results showed that eating a Fast Bar doesn't interfere with key physiological markers of fasting.  The study also showed that Fast Bar gave people a feeling of being fuller and curbed the desire to eat for up to 3 hours after consumption. In other words, you can eat a Fast Bar to help make fasting easier and more pleasant, and maintain similar ketone and blood glucose levels as a water-only fast.

templates.name: Needle: Best practice tips
templates.content:
I'm sorry that you have been having difficulty with your needle. Here are some of our best practice tips for needle use.

- Ensure that your needle is as finger-tightened as possible before inserting it into the cork.
- Be sure that the needle guide is sitting right on top of the cork.
- While you're pouring, be sure to use both hands the entire time - one hand to hold the bottle, and the other to hold the handle of the Coravin. If you only hold the bottle but not the Coravin handle, the needle will not be supported and this may cause it to bend
- During extraction, ensure that you're pulling the needle out perfectly straight (hold the clamps to the bottle with one hand and carefully pull up on the handle with the other)
- Daily rinse the spout and needle under a stream of hot tap water, remove from the water, and do a quick press and release of the trigger to clean and maintain your Coravin
- You'll know it's time to replace the needle when the black non-stick coating starts to wear off and the shiny steel of the needle becomes visible - after at least 300 uses

This video may help as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xs2vaEFqYdY

templates.name: How do I maintain the quality of my rug?
templates.content:
Trim any loose fibers with a scissor, do not pull.
Vacuum regularly on a low setting, ideally without a beater brush.
Avoid using any harsh chemicals as they can fade or damage your Rug.
We recommend you have your Rug professionally cleaned every 1-2 years.
Avoid folding your Rug in storage. Instead, we recommend rolling your rug front side out.

templates.name: Why was my order canceled?
templates.content:
An order can be canceled for many reasons. Are you able to go through this checklist with me?
Are you in the country where the store is located? For example, you must be in the USA at the time you are submitting an order to a US-based store. 

Are you trying to ship to Alaska or Hawaii? The Oral-B DTC store does not ship to these states.
Are you using a payment method that we accept in the store? 

Is the Billing Name and Address you entered on your order the same as it appears on your credit card statement? Sometimes even a minor difference will make the credit card company decline our pre-authorization and so we have to cancel the order. 

Is it possible the card has been reported as missing or stolen in recent days, or has it been turned off for new authorizations? Lately, some credit cards have a new feature that allows the consumer to turn off the card from new authorizations. If you think there may be the possibility anything like this might have happened, I would suggest calling your credit card company just to make sure they know you want to use the card and that they see it is in good standing. 

Do you have enough credit limit on your card to cover the order? If you are using a debit card for the order, you still need to have enough in the checking account tied to that card for the order to be approved. 

If this doesn't help, we completely apologize and regret the loss, but you may purchase your brush heads through other retailers.

templates.name: Why was my order cancelled? / Fraud flag
templates.content: It is likely that the order was rejected by our automated risk management software. We use advanced screening software to detect orders that are fraudulent or have a high chargeback risk. The software analyzes a wide range of information pertaining to your order and if the conditions under which the order is placed are considered high risk it will be rejected. Also, orders that are placed using proxy server or VPN have a high risk for rejection as well. As the system is completely automated and we are currently unable to override, you could try using a different form of payment, different contact and/or shipping information. templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 3/3)
templates.content: For now, we have an add-on adapter (Universal Adapter Head: https://www.peakdesign.com/collections/tripods/products/universal-head-adapter) that allows our tripod to be used with any 3rd party ball head using a traditional 3/8Â screw. If you use panning frequently, this adaptor allows for the integration of that specific functionality. Additionally, we have seen some folks using panning adapters on top of our ball head. Hope this helps!

templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 2/3)
templates.content: We are aware that the Compact Ball Head may not be ideal for the video-making community or folks who use panning in their photography. Because of this, we hope to have a pan/tilt video in our future product roadmap or an adapter that would work with this current ball head. Similarly, we are closely following feedback about panning functionality and it may similarly influence our development roadmap.

templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 1/3 OF YOU WILL BE SENDING IF YOU GET THIS SPECIFIC QUESTION)
templates.content: The Compact Ball Head on the Peak Design Travel Tripod does not have an independent panning function. For our first foray into ball heads, we prioritized space savings and a streamlined interface based around the most common workflows we saw in R&D and user research. Using the Peak Design ball head ring creates a unique and delightful workflow that is different than typical ball heads and we encourage you to give it a try without comparing features 1:1 with other heads.

templates.name: Will you restore, enhance, or improve my items in any way?
templates.content: We always try to get the best quality conversion possible, however, the quality of the transfer ultimately depends on the quality of the original items. We don't offer any sort of restoration, enhancement, or editing of your items. If there's an issue with the original, those issues will translate over to the digital copies. To be more specific, we don't offer color correction, brightening (lightening), HD remastering, combining footage, or otherwise altering the composition of the original media. There are companies out there who specialize in these types of services, but we simply offer a one-to-one transfer.

templates.name: Can I use the porch potty premium indoors?
templates.content: The Porch Potty Premium is designed for outdoor use, so we generally don't recommend placing it indoors. However, if you have both a water supply and proper drainage in your laundry area, it can work there as well. For best results and to avoid unwanted odors, we recommend giving it a quick rinse each day.

templates.name: How do I care for/clean my Boots?
templates.content:
The rubber shell and nylon upper are very durable and clean up easily with a spray of water or gentle scrubbing with soap and water. The rubber upper can be conditioned with wax polish, or liquid detergent. It is not recommended to use conditioners on the outsole area. This may cause it to become slick in wet or icy conditions.

You can learn more on how to care for your Muck Boots here: https://www.muckbootcompany.com/care-guide/

templates.content: The life of a wig really depends on a lot of different factors. How the wig is worn, washed, brushed, and cared for all affect how long it will last. On average, a wig should last for 1-2 years with proper maintenance and attention.

templates.name: Are Warmies safe for people with diabetes?
templates.content:
Our products are designed for everyone, and many customers with diabetes have found comfort with Warmies.

However, it's important to note that some people with diabetic peripheral neuropathy cannot tell when something is too hot or too cold for their skin. Excessively heating Warmies and placing them on your skin may cause burns. For this reason, we recommend you always follow the heating and cooling instructions located on the hangtags, packaging, and sewn-in labels (You can also find instructions in our care guide).

Additionally, if you or your child have diabetes, we recommend consulting your doctor before using Warmies.

templates.name: Can I replace the L-Bar with a Fast Bar or other types of nuts?
templates.content: Due to the carefully studied, carefully formulated macro- and micro-nutrient ratio in the L-Bar, there is no substitute that meets its exact profile. Although Fast Bar is very similar to ProLon' s Nut L-Bars, there is a slight difference in size, calorie count and sugar content Any substitute will likely differ from the ratio and amount of specific macro- and/or micro- nutrients and may interfere with the benefits of the diet. If you elect to simply omit the L- Bar, please note that changes in the food included in the program, including removal of foods, has not been studied. Any changes may result in interfere with both the safety and the outcome of the diet.

templates.name: How do you wear Baggage Claim Eye Masks

templates.name: Whirl Trio - How do I change the barrel?
templates.content:
Turn the heat all the way off by pressing and holding the Power & Temperature Switch.  Hold the tool by the handle with the barrel pointing up. Push the locking mechanism (the rose gold stand in the middle of the tool) to the left until the dot lines up with the "unlock" icon - you will hear a "click". Then pull the barrel out.

To insert a new barrel, line up the three side pins in the barrel with the slots in the handle and insert the barrel firmly into the handle. Then turn the locking mechanism to the lock position - you will hear a "click".

templates.name: How do I clean my Made In Flatware?
templates.content:
All of Made In's flatware should be washed immediately after use by hand if possible. If you put your flatware in the dishwasher, make sure the pieces are positioned vertically to prevent water stains. Immediately following the dishwashing cycle, pieces should be dried by hand.

We do not recommend the use of detergents containing chlorides, iodides, bromides, and acid-base products to protect the appearance of your flatware. We also recommend a detergent concentration between 3-5% to protect your Made In flatware and your dishwasher.

When handwashing, use warm water, mild dish soap, and a sponge to scrub away any residue left on the flatware. Avoid letting pieces soak overnight or air dry. If there are streaks, simply dampen a cloth with a bit of olive oil and rub the marks. Then rinse and dry immediately.

templates.name: How do your compression socks work for swelling?
templates.content: By gently squeezing your legs, our moderate level compression socks gently push blood and lymph up the legs, which results in better blood flow and reduced fluid buildup. Better blood flow and reduced fluid buildup means less swelling and reduced risk for blood clots.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my bonded leather furniture?

templates.name: What is the difference between tablets, capsules and soft gels?

templates.name: Medical Weight Loss: What are the side effects?
templates.content: Side effects for GLP-1s may include nausea, vomiting, stomach pain, upset stomach, dizziness, constipation, feeling bloated, belching, gas, headaches and fatigue. If you do experience side effects, they usually subside after a few weeks of your body getting used to the medication. Each patient will receive prescription medication to help combat the side effects should they arise along with directions on dosage to help keep side effects to a minimum.  In the most recent clinical trials, less than 5% of people discontinued GLP-1 medications because of side effects.

templates.name: System: Limited Pours from Capsules
templates.content:
We're sorry that you have had some issues with optimal performance from the Coravin Capsules. These tips and pointers may help.

- When inserting the capsule, quickly tighten the capsule cup onto the Coravin unit until it's as tight as you can get it - there should be no more give to the cup. This should ensure that the seal is complete and the gas will not slowly leak over a short period of time. And don't "untwist" the cup until you're sure it's empty; otherwise all of the gas that is remaining will quickly release.
- Another note - you want to be sure you only use enough gas for the pour that you want. If, when you finish your pour and bring the bottle back to an upright position, you hear a long release of gas then you may have used too much gas for the pour that you want and the gas just releases into the air and is wasted. At the end of your pour you should hear only a slight "psst" of gas if you hear anything at all.
- Finally, if you're going to finish a bottle, we recommend you pull the cork to conserve argon gas. If you're going to pour the rest of the bottle of wine, don't pressurize with argon until the bottle is completely empty. The Coravin System is not meant to replace removing the cork entirely - if you're going to finish a bottle of wine then just pull the cork!

You may find this video helpful as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWNuENf0Gys

templates.name: When is the best time to take Gold?
templates.content:
Taking Gold in the evening after a meal or a few hours before bed will help set your body up to switch from a sympathetic (stress state) to parasympathetic (rest and relax state).  A warm cup of Gold mixed with hot water or milk/milk alternative can give the body a sense of comfort and ease, allowing the body to fall asleep more easily.

Simply add 1 serving (1 scoop) to 8-10 oz of water or combine with your beverage of choice (milk, milk alternative or sparkling water are some of our customer favorites), mix and enjoy the superfood benefits!

templates.name: How long does it take to fully charge? What's the battery (expected) life?
templates.content:
Generally with our standard charger, it takes 6-8 hours to fully charge the battery, whereas with the Supercharger it only takes 2-4 hours. Ideally you should charge the battery until it is fully charged each time in order to maximize its lifetime. Remember with a standard battery you can travel 30-60 miles on one charge, or with a long range battery, 50-90 miles. So there's plenty of time to charge your battery overnight if you're one of those people who is going to be riding every day! Rhinos are equipped with 15Ah or 21Ah high capacity Samsung Cell Lithium Removable batteries which are some of the most energy dense and reliable on the market and are designed to let you go further, more efficiently.
That said, typically with lithium technology (like in our batteries), you'll see a reduction of up to 15-20% of battery capacity after around 500 full charge cycles. The 500 charging cycles are additive, so charging your battery at 50% up to 100% means you're only consuming half of a charging cycle.

templates.name: How do I manually operate the locks?

templates.name: Can I add another iPhone as a key to lock and unlock the Haven as needed? Will I also need a hub and key fob?
templates.content:
Once you pair your first phone that will be the "master key". From there, you will be able to send anyone in your family an e-key. You can do so by clicking on the key icon in your app! 

Please keep in mind - once you send an e-key out, they will only need to accept the key and not go through the pairing process when you pair your phone directly to the app.

templates.name: Will it work on French doors?
templates.content: Yes! Our lock works great on french doors! Simply install the lock in the middle of the doors with an even catch of 1/4" of each door. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with!

templates.name: I lost my phone
templates.content: You can control HAVEN via your key fob or manually via the foot pedal. If you lose your phone, we advise you to unlink your phone from your HAVEN Connect via the online portal to prevent unauthorized access. If you are locked out of your house you can send an eKey to another user via the online portal and use that device to gain access. If none of these are an option for you, please contact support at (615) 538-5807.

templates.name: Do I need WiFi for Bluetooth Haven (haven connect)?
templates.content: Our HAVEN Connect bluetooth lock relies on bluetooth technology and does not need a WiFi connection to be engaged or disengaged! But there are benefits of using WiFi through our hub. Our hub lets you utilize various integrations like Alexa skills and Attack Detection as well as remote access outside of Bluetooth range.

templates.name: What size screw do I need for the installation?
templates.content: We recommend 2 3/4" screws at installation with a 3/16 diameter.

templates.name: Can I unlock the lock manually?
templates.content: You can easily unlock the lock by stepping on the lifted gate with your foot.  The gate may make a popping sound, and that is normal.  The gate will lower to allow the door to pass freely over the lock.

templates.name: Can my dog lock/unlock it?
templates.content: The locking pedal on the right wing of the lock cannot be activated by a dog.  It takes specific dexterity and force to press and engage this lock. We have never had an issue with a dog accidentally locking someone out. :)

templates.name: Steps to connect haven connect to work with Alexa?"
templates.content: Search for "haven lock" in the Amazon Alexa app in the skills section and enable the skill, then search for devices. Once you enable the skill, you’ll be asked to link your Haven account to Alexa. During the linking process, you have to give your Haven account username and password - not your Amazon or Alexa login credentials. Hope this helps! :)

templates.name: Can I pair both of my locks on one phone?
templates.content: Yes, you can pair one phone to multiple locks :) But you will want to be sure you're not pairing each phone to the lock. One phone has to be the "master" key and that person can send the second person an e-key for access.

templates.name: Will this work on sliding doors?
templates.content: Yes, it would! You can watch this video to properly measure and size your door with our kits. - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t69ueNIDt0c&t=184s

templates.name: How do I switch on Z-wave locks from sleep mode?
templates.content: When new z-wave locks are in a "sleep" mode, you can "wake" up the lock by quickly pressing and releasing the pinhole reset button on the lock. You will want to use a paperclip or a similar tool to perform this wake up action.

templates.name: Once escalated

templates.name: What is needed to make Haven connect lock/unlock from anywhere in the world?
templates.content: In order to lock/unlock from anywhere in the world, you would need our Gateway Hub and Connect Bluetooth model. You will be able to lock and unlock your Connect anywhere you are connected to WiFi or cellular data. You can also create e-keys that will enable you to share access, schedule times of access of remote lock, or unlocking of your device. I hope this helps :)

templates.name: Can I use the Ring App alone with the Z-Wave lock?
templates.content: You could use our app and hub with our Bluetooth connect to access and engage the lock. But you cannot simply have the Ring app to use our Z-Wave lock. You will need the Sri g security base station to integrate the Z-Wave lock within the Ring app. Using the Ring app with a doorbell camera alone will not allow our lock to integrate with our Z-Wave lock.

templates.name: I don't have my phone/ remote on me, can I unlock manually?
templates.content: Yes, all of our locks can be engaged and disengaged manually.

templates.name: Can I set up routines / automatically lock my Haven every day at a set time?
templates.content: Yes, you can set routines by connecting your lock to Amazon Alexa. You need to make sure you have our Bluetooth lock, and a gateway hub in order to make this connection to Alexa.

templates.name: Can I install the HAVEN Lock on top of the door as well?
templates.content: Great question! It's technically possible, but please be advised that we don't recommend our customers do this as this isn’t the way we designed the lock to work. We only advise installing the lock to the bottom of the door per its design.

templates.name: How to perform a factory reset?
templates.content: When performing a factory reset you will continuously hold down the admin button, press and release the paperclip pin hole reset button while still holding down the admin button, continue to hold the admin button down for another 10 or so seconds then release it. You will hear a chirp and an LED light sequence with the lock in about 30-60 seconds after this has been done. That will indicate your lock has been successfully reset.

templates.name: My lock is not locking or staying up
templates.content: Have you made sure the straps are evenly distributed under the locking gate face plate? Make sure these straps are also not pinched by the installation screws if the lock has been installed. Also, if you used our 3M tape option, be sure the tape is not touching the piano hinge as it can hinder the locks ability to lift.

templates.name: How do I unlock it?
templates.content: You would step directly in the middle of the locking gate. It may take a bit of effort but it will go down. Don't worry - you're not going to break it! ;)

templates.content: You would want to use the 4 digit number that is located on your original order confirmation email.

templates.name: Can I pair multiple locks to one fob?
templates.content: No, this is not possible. You can pair multiple fobs to one lock but a single fob can only pair to one lock.

templates.name: My lock isn't turning on.
templates.content: Is this a situation when taking it directly out of the box? If so, please be sure you first charge your lock for 6-8 hours before attempting to pair your phone to the lock.

templates.name: Local Connection Error
templates.content: Please try power down your phone then powering it back on. If you're still getting this issue, please delete and reinstall the app.

templates.name: I can't update my software
templates.content: Is this a new install or a lock you've had for a while? If it's new, please connect your phone to the lock, engage and disengage the lock. Exit the app then open it. Then you will proceed with a software update. If you're still having trouble, please delete and reinstall the app. This should solve your problem.

templates.name: My lock won't work with the app
templates.content: Can I take down your order number to see what products you might have?

templates.name: My fob died/isn't working
templates.content: Have you tried changing the battery? You will pop the top of the fob off to expose the circut board. The battery will slide out of the circuit board. You will replace this battery with a circular CR2032 battery.

templates.name: My app is saying that my "hub is in pairing mode"
templates.content: Have you paired your lock first? This is vital to successfully pairing your hub to your phone. Unplug your hub from power and ethernet and reset the hub by pressing and releasing the pinhole button on the back. From there, proceed to pairing your lock.

templates.name: Why am I not getting free shipping?

Simply enter any special instructions (requesting delayed shipment, for example) in this text box. You can also add a personalized, handwritten gift note to order at no charge if you're sending meals as a gift.

templates.name: How long do your meals last in the freezer?

templates.name: How long can the dips be frozen?
templates.content: The dips and all of our products are always good at least 9 months and up to a year as long as they are kept frozen. They will always have a use by date.

templates.name: Are meals frozen/ shipped frozez?
templates.content: Yes! Our meals come shipped to you frozen in an insulated cooler with dry ice. Keep them in your freezer until ready to use.

templates.name: Is your ceremonial matcha organic?
templates.content: No, our Ceremonial matcha, which is our highest grade, is not organic. In Japan, matcha has to be grown at a higher elevation to be considered organic. This higher elevation is not the ideal condition in which to grow matcha. This is why the most vibrant green and high-quality matcha teas you see are usually non-organic because the non-organic matcha is grown in ideal conditions.

templates.name: Do you use the preservative phenoxyethanol?
templates.content: While this preservative is commonly used in brands that market themselves as "natural" or "clean" it still carries some safety and environmental controversies. We choose to avoid it in all of our products, and it will always remain on our Banished Ingredients List.

templates.name: What kind of leathers do you use?
templates.content: We offer leather for our products in three finishes and many colors: natural dye finish, gloss finish, and metallic finish. The natural dye used in the Lizzy leather wraps has a slightly uneven variegated color making it look casual and organic. It wears the longest, compared to the metallic and gloss leather finishes. The metallic and gloss finishes have a brighter and consistent color. Because leather is organic (i.e. from a cow), it will vary in shape, color and consistency. In addition, it will soften as well as crack over time. The style of the Lizzy leather wrap bracelet is a "lived-in look".

templates.name: Can you get Silvessa products separately?
templates.content:
If you'd like to stop receiving a certain product in the Silvessa system, rest assured that you can do so within your Subscriptions page.

Each item in the Silvessa system appears as a separate product; find the one(s) that you would no longer like to receive. Click the "Cancel Subscription" button, found underneath the product quantity and frequency information on the right-hand side. In the box that pops up, select the reason you would like to cancel your subscription for that product, and click "Unsubscribe". You'll receive a confirmation message that your subscription for that specific product has been canceled, and the page will automatically refresh to remove the product.

templates.name: What does the bar above the ‘c’ in Clove represent?

templates.name: Will your mattress protector make my mattress sleep hotter?
templates.content: We specifically designed our mattresses so they would sleep cool, and we designed a protector that would do the same. To ensure a cool, pleasant sleep environment, our team also chose a breathable film to keep airflow at a maximum. In the protector, the protective film is sandwiched by a polyester knit fabric - the same material used in premium athletic wear to keep people cool when they're breaking a sweat. It has an integrated spacer layer, so air flows through it easily to keep things nice and breezy.

templates.name: What is a bean? (Rewards Points)
templates.content: "Beans" are points you can earn and redeem for rewards like dollars off your order or for a free product! The equivalence is $1 = 1 Bean. The amount of beans you earn for every order placed is determined by the subtotal of your order. This means that, if you use a discount code, you will earn beans according to the price of your item after the code has been applied, and also without including the shipping cost.

templates.name: These are synthetic fragrances, so does that mean they are not clean?
templates.content: Saying that something is clean or natural does not equal safe. The FDA has no definition for "natural" or "naturally derived" or "clean" and there is no regulation for use of these terms. Many essential oils contain contaminants such as skin sensitizers and allergens. Chemical constituents of the extract can vary according to harvest season, drying processes, extraction and isolation process. Heavy metal contamination is also common. Essential oils can also be adulterated. Synthetics can potentially be safer as they contain fewer contaminants than natural extracts - this is because the chemical synthesis is controlled. Some ingredients found in nature may be chemically synthesized as well.
