templates.name: Can I use the NIRA with Botox?
templates.content:
Botox treatment, derived from bacteria, is utilized to relax overused muscles. It's advisable to wait a minimum of two weeks after undergoing Botox treatment before using NIRA Laser to allow Botox to take full effect. This two-week interval between aesthetic treatments is typically recommended to ensure the skin has ample time to recover from the prior major treatment.

The NIRA Laser generates heat beneath the skin to promote collagen, which could potentially lessen the effectiveness of toxins introduced to your skin, such as those used in Botox treatments. While there might be no specific study on this concern, it's wise to stay on the side of caution to ensure that you maximize the benefits of your treatments and avoid any potential setbacks.

templates.name: What is the brown packet that comes inside the Powder Dish Soap / Dishwasher Tablet / Laundry Tablet pouch?
templates.content:
The brown packet included in your powder dish soap, dishwasher tablet, or laundry tablet refill pack is a plastic-free desiccant used to absorb moisture in order to maintain the consistency/format of your products. The desiccant is made of two eco-friendly materials including FSC Certified kraft paper and bentonite clay, which is a naturally occurring mineral.

Additionally, we do suggest keeping the desiccant with your products as you transfer it into the Forever Shaker or Tin, so that it can continue absorbing any moisture. Any moisture that's not absorbed may affect the efficacy, usage or shelf-life of the product.

templates.name: What juices are best for incontinence?

templates.name: How does Level.2 differ from the Level?
templates.content:
Level.2 has some of our newest features. Some of which, are Aventon firsts! Level.2 will still throttle on demand and can reach a top speed of 28 MPH when using pedal assist. The main difference is its upgraded torque sensor. While our cadence sensors previously recognize if you're pedaling and delivering a set amount of power per each assist level, the torque sensor recognizes how hard you're pedaling. The motor will then match your pedal cadence, giving you more assistance as you pedal faster or less if you pedal lighter, delivering a more natural riding experience. 
Level.2 is now equipped with our fan-favorite Full Color Display, which intuitively tracks your rides and can connect to the Aventon app! It also comes in new colorways with four total integrated lights: one headlight, two brake lights, and a fender light! Available in both a step over and step-through frame, Level.2 still includes a rear rack and fenders so you can transport all you need no matter where you ride!

templates.name: My Senia doesn't work/ How do I use the Senia?
templates.content:
If your Senia doesn't start and shows a red blinking light, carefully remove the water tank and turn the device upside down making sure that the water basin is empty. Then tap the device on its side 4-6 times - this will restart the sensor. Afterwards, take out the water tank, and open the tank cap counterclockwise. Fill the tank with 180 ml of distilled water and close the tank cap clockwise. Place the water tank back into place and plug the steamer in.

To know how the Senia Hot and Cold Smart Facial Steamer works, feel free to click on this link: https://www.vanityplanet.com/products/senia-hot-and-cold-smart-facial-steamer

Don't hesitate to reach out with any further questions regarding our Senia.

templates.name: Can your products be consumed by teens?
templates.content: Our products are absolutely beneficial for teens! Teens are at a unique stage in their life when nutrition is particularly important. Iron, zinc, protein, and calcium are just some of the nutrients that teens need to focus on. Their brains and bodies are undergoing rapid growth, at a rate only second to infancy/toddlerhood! For this reason, nutrient-dense foods are super important. Our Smart Bars are an excellent (and no sugar added) snack for teens. Our veggie-packed purees can offer a boost of zinc, iron, protein, and 13 other nutrients, and mix well with smoothies, oatmeal, in muffins/pancakes, soups, and sauces.

templates.name: How does EcoCart work?
templates.content: We direct the carbon offset funds to certified carbon offset projects like planting trees or building wind farms. templates.name: How does DHM Detox work?
templates.content: It helps boost your body's natural response to alcohol and it does so by assisting with the natural metabolism of alcohol. ADH and ALDH are enzymes naturally produced by your body that assist in the breakdown of alcohol and its toxic by-product, acetaldehyde. Unfortunately, these two enzymes need some assistance so they can do their job better. DHM is an important ingredient that may help improve the effectiveness of these enzymes, so the toxins can be broken down and flushed out of your system.

templates.name: Why was my order cancelled?
templates.content:
The exact reason your order was cancelled is unique to what you ordered.

If your order was cancelled, it is most likely that:

- The item was backordered and we did not receive replenishment in time.
- The shipping information is incorrect.
- We were unable to verify your credit card and billing information.

If your order is cancelled for any of the reasons above, you will receive an email confirming your order's cancellation. You are not charged for a cancelled order before it ships.

The full amount of the order will be refunded to the original payment method. Please allow up to two billing cycles for your account to reflect the refunded amount.

templates.name: Which Wait Time setting should I choose?
templates.content: The Wait Time is the elapsed time starting from when your cat exits the globe until the unit starts a Clean cycle. It can be set for 3, 7, or 15 minutes on Litter-Robot 3, or 3, 7, 15, 25, or 30 minutes on Litter-Robot 4. The default Wait Time is 7 minutes. Reduce the Wait Time if it is important to minimize odor and/or the time that waste is available to other pets-such as dogs. However, reducing the Wait Time may reduce the cleaning effectiveness if clumps do not have enough time to set up. Extend the Wait Time when using a lower-quality clumping litter that needs more time to set up.

templates.name: What happens if I stretch the vinyl too far?
templates.content: If this happens, peel the vinyl and let it hang. Use a swaying motion with a heat gun on the lowest setting and watch as it pulls back in and reverts to its previous shape, ready for another go. It has an internal memory and the heat will allow it to reset to its initial shape. When left to cool, the vinyl will harden and be ready to lay down properly.

templates.name: Source Hand Held/Source Showerhead  - I just installed it and my water pressure has dropped
templates.content: Please be sure to apply the plumber's tape to the shower pipe threads prior to installing the filter. Even if water is not leaking from the connection, the pressure may be affected if there isn't a snug fit. T3 Source products have a maximum flow rate of 2.5 gal/minute as mandated by the EPA. If your old showerhead had a higher flow rate, you will notice a drop in water pressure.

If you wear your bracelet in the water frequently, you may experience some color fading. Please note that this is a normal part of the aging process and nothing to be concerned about.

templates.name: Difference between Titan 2-in-1 Power Lantern vs Nova Solar
templates.content: The Titan 2-in-1 power lantern is our newest and most powerful product. Featuring all-new design innovations, including red light mode for night vision and a twist-to-inflate design and a maximum brightness of 300 Lumens. It can light your campsite with 100 hours of runtime, you can depend on it for extended power outages or off-grid expeditions. Nova Solar one the other hand offers 75 lumens of bright LED light on Turbo mode and it can run for up to 24 hours on low mode. The Titan 2-in-1 Power Lantern is heavier though at 12.5oz vs 5oz, but its 4000mAh battery can also recharge cell phones.

templates.name: Is your pink moon rose gluten free/organic?
templates.content:
In terms of gluten, our Pink Moon Rosé is in compliance with the FDA's rule defining 'gluten-free'- this means it contains less than 20 parts per million of gluten. The Rosé is not organic but is certified sustainable. Our vineyard has used sustainable agricultural practices and is continuing to experiment with new ones too!

templates.name: What is a plug-in hybrid?
templates.content: Like a hybrid, a plug-in hybrid (PHEV) is a gasoline- and electric-powered vehicle that uses a rechargeable battery to power an electric motor. The difference is that a plug-in hybrid has a larger battery, and the ability to charge that battery with an external power source - conventional hybrids rely on regenerative braking. The larger battery in a plug-in hybrid allows you to drive a significant distance on electric power alone. Indeed, they often have enough range to complete all of your daily commuting without having to use any gas if you plug in overnight. But, when you do want to take a longer trip, you still have the flexibility, range, and convenient refueling of a gasoline vehicle.

templates.name: What's not covered by your guarantee?
templates.content:
Here are the factors not covered by the guarantee: improper care - the tumbler is destroyed - usually from a deliberate act 
o Thrown against a wall, or hard object 
o Smashing it somehow 
o Big chunks are broken off 
o Left on a stove burner 
o Crushed by a vehicle 

Some tumblers have "Lifetime Guarantee" etched off the bottom because they were purchased at our Outlet and were a "final" severely discounted sale.
 
And non-tumblers Limited editions

o Vases

templates.name: Do all of your cups come with straws?
templates.content:
Our smaller 8oz and 12oz cups don't come with a reusable straw, but our larger 16oz and 24oz cups do.
If you'd like a straw for your 12oz, you're welcome to purchase one through our accessories page: https://stojo.co/collections/accessories-1 We don't have straws for our 8oz cups just yet, but definitely keep an eye out. :)

templates.name: Can I put boiling hot water in my cup? Will your cups keep my drinks warm?
templates.content: It can hold cold & hot beverages up to the boiling point. Our cup is built to move with you on the go and insulates hot/cold drinks just as much as a normal disposable cup would. Our cups are meant to be a replacement for single-use plastic and paper cups, and they were made by busy dads who wanted to reduce the amount of waste they produced by continually buying hot coffees several times a day. Our mission is to end the use of disposable single-use plastics, one reusable cup at a time!

templates.name: Can I put boiling hot water in my bottle?
templates.content: While our bottles can withstand temperatures up to a boiling point, we don't recommend using them for super hot liquids. We'd recommend our cups for hot beverages instead, as they come with a heat sleeve. Our heat sleeves not only protect your hand from hot beverages but also act as a stabilizer!

templates.name: Are your products microwave & dishwasher safe?
templates.content: Yes, our products are microwave & dishwasher safe! We’re all about making sustainable choices as easy as possible. We make “doing your part” a little easier, and better looking. :)

templates.name: Will putting XXX (coffee, hot cocoa, red wine, etc.) stain my cup?
templates.content: Over time some darker liquids like coffee can stain our food-grade silicone. To help with discoloration, we recommend soaking your cup in a mix of water and 3% hydrogen peroxide and letting it sit for 24-48 hours. This should do the trick! :)

templates.name: What are Stojos made of?
templates.content: Stojos are made of LFGB certified platinum food grade silicone & FDA grade polypropylene, or #5 recyclable plastic. (Oh, and love. Duh.) We believe our customers deserve the best quality materials, and transparency into our production standards.

templates.name: What does LFGB certified mean?
templates.content: LFGB is the German food safety standard, which has safer and higher standards than the US’ FDA standards. Our cups are free of BPAs, BPSs, phthalates, lead, and adhesives.

templates.name: What does the cc represent in model names?
templates.content: The "cc" in our models stands for "cleaning center," which means that this specific model comes with a cleaning center. For example, the Series 9 Pro + 9599cc indicates that this model includes a cleaning center. On the other hand, the "s" means that it is only the shaver and no other products are included in that model. For instance, the 7120s does not come with the cleaning center and includes only the shaver. Another example is the "cs," which means that the shaver comes with a charging stand.

templates.name: How many mini flat path lights can be placed on 1 wire run?
templates.content:
On any individual run, you'll want to limit the fixtures to either: 

1. 12 fixtures
2. 80 watts

Whichever you hit first, for most path light set ups, it is usually the twelve fixtures. This is not to say you will immediately fail, but we can't guarantee anything beyond that. I would recommend checking as you add lights, so you don't need to uninstall too much if you end up going too far.

templates.name: Can I replace the battery of my Braun device myself?

You can contact an authorized Braun service center to have your battery replaced. GLD receives hundreds of custom requests and this allows us to separate curious people from those that are intending to purchase a custom piece.
 
Upon paying the consultation fee, you will be paired with a custom jewelry expert who will work with you to design your custom piece.
 
We work primarily with 10-24k solid gold (Yellow, White, and Rose Gold) and all classes of gems. We also can work with Rhodium, Sterling Silver, and Platinum. The time of the custom process varies from 2-8 weeks depending on the complexity of the design and the changes you require during design.

templates.name: Should I wear gloves while installing?
templates.content: While working with the vinyl, it's possible for sweat and skin oils to get on the adhesive from your hands. This contamination reduces the ultimate adhesion level of the backing. I recommend washing your hands and even wiping them with a cloth using isopropyl alcohol to remove any remaining moisture, oil, and debris to reduce the possibility of contamination. Another alternative is to wear a pair of forming fitting latex or vinyl gloves.

templates.name: What's the difference between Sonicsmooth and Microsmooth?
templates.content: Sonicsmooth features quick, easy, and painless exfoliation and peach fuzz removal. It preps the skin for better skincare absorption, removes build-up on the top layer of skin, and has flawless makeup application. Microdermabrasion, on the other hand, is a simple, fast, and effective method to visually enhance the skin's appearance, texture, and color by gently removing the top outermost layer of dead skin; making the skin smoother, more supple and vibrant. Microsmooth is designed to be an in-between microdermabrasion treatment - to be used in between your weekly Sonicsmooth treatments for an instantly softer, smoother and more radiant complexion.

templates.name: Mini Guitar Kit - Which strings should I use?
templates.content:
For the Mini Guitar Kits, you can use a standard guitar string set starting at .009" or .010" gauge if you tune A to A, similar to having a capo at the 5th fret of a standard-scale guitar.

If you want to tune a full octave up to get back to E to E tuning, you can use a .009" set but will need to replace the high-E string with a .007" gauge string. Otherwise, it may break from the added tension. You could also use a set starting with .007", such as our item #1346 Dunlop Reverend Willy's Electric Guitar Strings: https://www.stewmac.com/strings-and-accessories/strings/electric-guitar-strings/dunlop-reverend-willys-electric-guitar-strings/

templates.name: How does eos ensure their products are safe?
templates.content:
All of our products are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested, gluten-free, and made with best-in-class ingredients (like shea butter, jojoba oil, and antioxidant vitamins!)

We validate all our products through rigorous testing by our own scientists and by independent labs.

As a first step, we assess the specifications and testing done by suppliers of each ingredient in our products, and choose only those that meet our standards. Every final product is then tested for a range of safety and quality standards, as well as for their effectiveness.

Our testing meets or exceeds all safety and quality standards set by industry norms or regulatory bodies.

templates.name: Why should I use water based products?
templates.content: Using water-based products is essential to keeping low-porosity hair because they don't cause build-up on the hair. They also often contain a combination of water, nourishing oils, conditioning agents, and humectants to provide a light, permeable seal that allows your hair to absorb moisture from the air and lock it into the strand.

templates.name: Can starting solid foods too early cause childhood obesity?
templates.content:
We're unaware of any evidence showing a link specifically between starting solids after 4 months and obesity. To our knowledge, there's only evidence that starting solids before 4 months can lead to obesity (shown in toddlerhood). 

From a brain development perspective, breastmilk or formula should be 'almost' the sole source of nutrition before 6 months of age. So yes, it's okay to wait until 6 months. That being said, if your baby is ready for solids between 4-6 months (check readiness with pediatrician), then 'what type foods' you offer can have an impact on brain development. This is because certain nutrients are preferentially utilized for brain development at this time. Nutrients like iron, vitamin A, zinc, copper and iodine.

templates.name: How do I care / wash my blanket? It shrunk
templates.content: Dry cleaning is the best way to maintain your blanket. Even with the mildest washing methods blankets will lose 3"-6" in length, and shrinkage could increase with successive launderings. Also, blankets may become stiff and dense, permanently changing the soft hand and smooth appearance. So unless a blanket specifically states "washable" please dry clean only.

templates.name: Mini Guitar Kit - Which strings should I use?
templates.content:
For the Mini Guitar Kits, you can use a standard guitar string set starting at .009" or .010" gauge if you tune A to A, similar to having a capo at the 5th fret of a standard-scale guitar.

If you want to tune a full octave up to get back to E to E tuning, you can use a .009" set but will need to replace the high-E string with a .007" gauge string. Otherwise, it may break from the added tension. You could also use a set starting with .007", such as our item #1346 Dunlop Reverend Willy's Electric Guitar Strings: https://www.stewmac.com/strings-and-accessories/strings/electric-guitar-strings/dunlop-reverend-willys-electric-guitar-strings/

templates.name: How do I cancel my VIP membership, and or subscription?
templates.content:
While we would hate to see you go, rest assured, you may cancel at any time. To cancel your VIP membership or subscription:

1) log into your account on our website (top right corner of our menu)
2) click on the 'subscriptions & billing' tab
3) click on the 'subscriptions' tab on the submenu to access all of your active and inactive subsccriptions
4) click on the subscription you wish to adjust
5) scroll to bottom of the subscription details page and click on the 'cancel subscription' button.

Once cancelled, it will appear under the "Cancelled Memberships" section. If you are looking to cancel because you have an overstock of products, please remember you can adjust the frequency of your shipments at any time. If you need a temporary pause you may also push out your next processing date up to 6 months.

templates.name: Difference between the S1.25 European plug and dual voltage ?
templates.content: The standard voltage in Europe is 220-240v and in the US it's 120-140v. If the device that is set to only one voltage is used in the other without a converter there's a possibility of frying the device (or worse). The 1.25 dual voltage can handle 100-240v so there are no worries about frying the device if you're traveling frequently to countries that use different voltages.

templates.name: How do I select my hair type (for hair quiz)?
templates.content:
We define the different categories of hair types as:

- Straight: Hair strands tend to not have a bend or a curl - Hair Type 1.
- Wavy: Hair has a slight bend or wave pattern; somewhere between straight and curly - Hair Type 2.
- Curly: Hair has a definite curl, S-shaped, or loopy pattern. Can be prone to dryness and frizz - Hair Type 3.
- Coily: Hair has a tight curl, spiral, or zig-zag pattern; tighter curls than curly hair. Sometimes known as "kinky" or "textured" hair - Hair Type 4.

templates.name: What is the best approach to adjusting pinion depth?
templates.content: Start by making wide, sweeping changes and whittle the adjustment down by making smaller and smaller changes. In this context consider 0.005" to 0.015" as a 'large' adjustment and 0.002" to 0.004" as a 'small' change. For more in-depth information check out our "12 tips for differential assembly and setup" blog article here: https://www.randysworldwide.com/blogs/12-tech-tips-for-differential-assembly-setup

templates.name: Will my dog like wearing your dog sneakers?
templates.content: Similarly to putting any foreign object on your dog for the first time (e.g. collars, harnesses, clothes), putting our dog sneakers on will take some time to break in and adjust to, especially if your dog has never worn dog shoes before. We recommend being as patient as possible and to slowly build up the time your dog wears our dog shoes each day until they are capable of doing a full walk in them. Start by letting your dog wear only the front shoes for a few minutes the first few days, then gradually let your dog wear all four dog shoes and in parallel increase the amount of time the dog shoes are worn each day. Positive reinforcement (i.e., plenty of treats) goes a long way!

templates.name: If Tongkat Ali is a muscle-building herb, is it legal for athletes?
templates.content: Tongkat Ali (Eurycoma longifolia) isn't mentioned in the lists of prohibited anabolic compounds of major sports associations. A few studies tested whether or not conventional doping tests, like the urinary T/E ratio, would detect the impact of Tongkat Ali. The result is negative. Even though the athletes' androgen levels were clearly elevated, the T/E ratio remained within the acceptable range after 6 weeks of Tongkat Ali supplementation. Just to be safe, though, check the official documentation of your tournament or sports association.

templates.name: How can I clean the shoes?
templates.content: Our shoes are made of real leather so we expect to see natural wear and spots from the environment your little ones explore. I'd be happy to help provide some cleaning tips! For light spot cleaning using a simple baby wipe will sometimes do the trick! For heavier spot cleaning, we have found that using a damp cloth with a small amount of mild detergent, such as baby detergent, works great. First, stuff them with newspaper or paper towels, so the leather is tight. Then, you'll wipe the Piper Finns as much as needed, saturating them with the cleaning solution. It's best to let the shoes sit and dry (preferably in the sun, if you can). They might dry a little darker, but they will lighten up shortly after. You can then use the brush inside the cleaning kit to lightly brush and even out the leather after they completely dry. If you don't have a cleaning kit, something with soft bristles such as a toothbrush will also work.

templates.name: Difference between Arctic and Original Performance
templates.content: SHEEX Arctic Aire sheets present a 300 thread count woven sateen sheet made from 100% TENCEL Lyocell, feels softer than silk, and has CoolX™ Technology. Our Original Performance sheets fabrication is 87% microfiber polyester, 13% spandex, making it feel more similar to workout clothes. They are both soft and cooling. The Arctic is woven and Original Performance is a knit fabric. If you really like the feel of cotton but are looking for cooling sheets, try the Arctic. If you are open to a new fabric feel, try the Original Performance. I prefer that Original Performance. Hope that helps!

templates.name: What makes these boots so great?
templates.content:
Our exclusive, self-insulating, waterproof NEOPRENE shell construction. The NEOPRENE bootie material acts as a "neutral medium" between inside and outside temperatures. Naturally lightweight, and very comfortable, the material keeps the foot and lower leg warm and protected in cold and wet conditions.

Natural rubber overlays act as a protective skin for the upper bootie. The upper has a triple-reinforced toe area and quadruple-reinforced heel area. The outsole is made of high abrasion natural rubber. The rubber in the boots will stay flexible for years.

templates.name: What are Locking Tuners?
templates.content: The difference between the locking tuners and non-locking tuners is that locking tuners have a clamping mechanism to lock the string in place. Locking tuners are most beneficial for guitars with a tremolo, as the strings are locked to the tuner. This reduces the amount of string slippage and will better keep the guitar in tune when using a tremolo.

templates.name: What's your guarantee for the classic tumblers?
templates.content:
They are guaranteed for life for manufacturer defects. These are the factors considered as manufacturer defects: 

 - Film, Hazy, Stained, sunscreen damage 
- Water, liquid, mold between the layers (seal failure) 
- Heat distortion from the dishwasher (warped or bubbled up) 
- Cracking in the plastic 
- Decoration failure (emblem is falling and moving around) 
- A simple drop that causes cracking or separating of the layers 

If your tumbler has one or more of the above, you can check on our guarantee form here: https://www.tervis.com/lifetime-guarantee

templates.name: Difference between the toddler and infant side of the waterproof pad/cover?
templates.content: The cover for the Original mattress isn't waterproof but it's water resistant. Most messes won't go through to the core, allowing you to easily switch the cover during a late night change and get your little one back to sleep. It has the same breathe-thru materials on both sides making it easy to flip or switch as needed. When you're ready to add waterproof protection during toddler and potty training stages, the Crib Mattress Pad easily fits on it like a fitted sheet giving breathable, waterproof protection. The pad is also a great item to have when traveling or for a childcare setting. Our Waterproof mattress has an underlining of waterproofing on one side of the cover for toddler years and the same breathe-thru material of the Original on the infant side. The biggest risk for suffocation during child development is during the first 12 months. Though the waterproof side is still breathable, we want infants to have the most breathable, completely unhindered airflow sleeping environment possible for the first year, which is why we recommend waiting until year 1 to use the waterproof side, however, you know your child's development and mobility best. While we understand waterproofing seems most desirable to help with messes, the infant side of the cover is water-resistant and when babies leak or *explode* in the first year of life, these accidents are easily managed by washing the cover and most times even rinsing the core.

templates.name: Are your products dishwasher safe?
templates.content:
Our lead-free glassware is dishwasher safe, although hand washing is recommended. Avoid cleaners that contain citrus, as it may damage the glass and potentially cause cloudiness. Extreme changes in temperature may cause our glass to crack. Glass pieces with handles are particularly vulnerable. We suggest you not use glass in the microwave or place in the refrigerator or freezer to chill. Boiling hot liquids should never be poured into any handled glass. When pouring hot liquids into any other glass, place a metal spoon in the container before pouring. Intense heat may cause a candleholder to crack if the flame is allowed to burn below the rim.

All our pottery is lead-free and safe to place in the dishwasher or microwave. We do suggest you put baking dishes in a cold oven, rather than a preheated oven, when cooking or baking, allowing them to come to temperature as the oven warms.

templates.name: It looks like I have rust stains in my bottle. How do I clean this?
templates.content: Stainless Steel is not rust-proof, but it's rust-resistant. If you see rust it can be removed by using a mixture of baking soda or vinegar on the rust spot. Let it sit for 5-10 minutes, then scrub with a soft sponge or bottle brush. If you can't remove the rust, we encourage you to submit a warranty claim for your bottle.

templates.name: How much meal topper powder should I give my dog daily?

Add the recommended scoop(s) to your dog's food daily to boost flavor and support gut health, promote a healthy response to seasonal allergies, and for skin health! Some customers have found it helpful to mix with water for a dry food topper. Mix the topper into the food thoroughly to coat the kibble or wet food.

templates.name: What does "clean" mean? Are your products all-natural?
templates.content: Our products aren't 100% natural, though they are all primarily natural. We do not believe "natural" inherently means an ingredient is good or, conversely, synthetics are inherently bad. "Clean" means that our focus is on creating cosmetics that are free from harmful ingredients without compromising on performance, quality, or price-point. All our ingredients, whether natural or synthetic, are rigorously researched for safety within the context of a particular formulation and selected based on serving a necessary function, such as pigmentation, preservation, or performance. With our formulation strategy, we exclude 1,500+ controversial offenders that are known or suspected carcinogens, endocrine and hormone disruptors, allergens, and animal by-products. We know there are different brands throwing around different words to describe their products, so we encourage our customers to thoroughly read ingredient labels and make educated decisions for themselves; for our part, we promise to always do the leg-work to ensure our ingredient lists are safe and transparent.

templates.name: What's the difference between Wave 1 and Wave 2?
templates.content:
Great question! The first key difference is a much-improved battery. Also, the Wave 2 can reach lower temperatures and create cooler, more powerful sensations than any other wearable on the market. 

Our studies have shown that the Wave 2 is capable of warming/cooling 30% more effectively than the Wave 1. Using either the app or the Wave's buttons, you can fine-tune your Wave to best fit your needs.
 
We made the new Wave more than 20% lighter with a more compact, ergonomic form factor. (It's so comfortable, you might even forget you're wearing it!) And even with a smaller ceramic plate, testers rated the cooling and warming sensations of Wave 2 as more powerful compared to Wave 1.
 
We understand that thermal comfort can be a very individual experience, and Embr Wave may not be the perfect solution for every person. For this reason, the best way to find out if Embr Wave will work for you is to try it out for yourself. 

We have a 30-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed policy, so if it turns out Embr Wave isn't right for you, no problem. You can return it within 60 days for a full refund!

templates.name: I read that heat destroys vitamins. How can the vitamins retain their potency if this is the case?
templates.content: Rest assured that rigorous testing was performed by a third party to confirm that our vitamin levels remained at the levels stated in our ingredients listings. Vitamins can indeed be partially destroyed in heat, so as a workaround, we included over the amount of each vitamin to ensure that after heating, we've compensated for the amount reduced. You can learn more on our blog post here: https://www.vitacup.com/blogs/news/does-coffee-or-heat-destroy-vitamins

templates.name: My PMD Clean Pro will not power on, what's wrong?
templates.content: Please double-check that the travel lock is not engaged. To disengage the travel lock, first remove the charging cable. Then hold down the front and back power buttons together for a quick 123 count. When you're doing this, be sure that the thumb is not covering the entire front button so you can see the flashes. If the front power button flashes once, you have unlocked the device and should now be able to power it with a quick press of the power button. If the front power button flashes twice, the PMD Clean Pro has been locked up and you will need to hold down the two power buttons together for another 123 count to get the front button to flash only one time. Then you can do a quick press to power it on. Let me know how that goes!

The 3i has 3 gears and the 7i has 7 gears. The ratios of gears 1, 2 and 3 of the 3i are the same as the ratios of 3, 5, and 7 of the 7i. With the 3i, moderate hils are climbed. Gears 1 and 2 of the 7 speed are for climbing even steeper hills.

templates.name: Why am I getting the wrong (an old) HD photo/video when I request one?
templates.content:
When you request an HD photo or video, but you get one that is for a different (usually older) photo, that's a sign that there is something wrong with your SD card. You can read more about it here: https://support.spartancamera.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040823914-Why-am-I-getting-the-wrong-an-old-HD-photo-video-when-I-request-one- 

You can try formatting the SD card, but you may need to replace it. If your camera has the red Format button on the status report page in the app, you may want to try that because that may fix the problem so that you don't have to go to your camera. Just be aware that everything on the card will be erased.

templates.name: How can I determine the amount of water in my pond?
templates.content:
To determine the gallons of water in a square or rectangular pond: Multiply average length x average width x average depth x 7.5 = gallons of water.

To determine the gallons of water in a circular pond: Multiply (half the diameter) x (half the diameter) x 3.14 x depth x 7.5 = gallons

templates.name: What can I use if I can't use condoms?
templates.content:
Revaree and Revaree Plus are not compatible with natural rubber latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene condoms. As with many topical treatments for vaginal atrophy, contact with Revaree may weaken the integrity of the condom. However, unlike topical estrogen products, Revaree is non-estrogenic and has no adverse effects on the penis. Revaree has not been tested with other types of condoms, so we can't advise on their compatibility.

For best results, we suggest that you allow the insert one hour to melt and absorb before engaging in sexual activity. However, the time it takes to fully absorb will differ for everyone.

If you have specific concerns, we encourage you to speak with your healthcare provider to determine the approach that works best for you.

templates.name: Edge - What is PrecisionEdge design?

templates.name: Is nightwise FDA approved?
templates.content: Dietary supplements, in general, are not approved by the FDA. Under the law (the Dietary Supplement Health and Education Act of 1994), NightWise® cannot seek FDA approval prior to marketing our products. However, we go above and beyond by testing each batch of NightWise® for identity and purity so we can be sure that what's on the label is what's in the capsules. We also use a third-party, independent lab to test each batch for heavy metals and microbes thereby ensuring they are below levels deemed safe by regulations.

templates.name: Why do you collect state tire fees?
templates.content:
Individual states have established programs to deal with tire waste. As tires are not biodegradable, they remain in landfills in their original state. While this prevents the tires from environmental damage during their usage, unfortunately, it also damages the environment once the tires are removed from the vehicle. 

States have organized versatile programs to recycle and reuse worn out tires as tire waste has been a growing problem. However, these programs need to be funded. To fund them, each state established the state tire fees which help cover the cost of recycling. Installers and tire distributors pay these funds to ensure the unusable tires are correctly recycled and used.

As a result, Priority Tire, as other tire distributors, is required to charge state tire fees from our customers.

templates.name: Can I fly during a ProLon cycle?
templates.content:
There are no contraindications to flying during use of ProLon, but you may have challenges if you need to eat on a long flight because the soups, the primary components of each day's meals, are designed to be prepared over the stove or with a microwave.

You could elect to prepare the soups in 3fl oz of hot water, and add hot water in flight; or you can reserve your olives, L-Bar, and/or Choco-Crisp Bar to eat while in flight and opt for soups before departure and after arrival when you can prepare them. In addition, bringing liquids like the L-Drink onto a flight may present a challenge due to the size of the bottle (4fl oz).

templates.name: Can I create a scannable tattoo (ie. barcodes, soundwaves, QR Codes)?
templates.content:
Unfortunately, while these types of tattoos look great, they usually don't work. There are a few reasons as to why scannable tattoos likely won't scan on your skin. 

- Body Curvature: The human body does not have a lot of flat spots. Once applied to a curved surface, scanning a code can become more difficult. Additionally, skin is very flexible, which can have a big impact on if a code will scan or not. 
- Line Weight: The custom team often needs to increase the line weight of designs, which in the case of barcodes will make them unusable. 
- Smudging: Codes such as barcodes and QR codes often have thin or small white areas. These can easily be lost by the surrounding ink smudging and filling in the area. 
- Application Error: You may not have perfect application. All it takes is a small scratch or crease during application to make the code not usable.

templates.name: Are Seamless hair extensions water resistant?
templates.content:
Yes, Seamless extensions are water resistant, however, we recommend ensuring your extensions don't come into contact with water for longer than 20 to 30 minutes (like during washing). This is because, over time, water may seep into the base cavities of the silicone weft band. This can make the drying process difficult since silicone is not as breathable as having a fabric base.

Similar to our Classic Collection, we recommend you avoid swimming or showering with the extensions clipped in to prevent unnecessary damage and tangling with your own hair.

templates.name: Do I need to prepare anything before I apply a tattoo?
templates.content:
Nothing major - but there are a few things to keep in mind:

- Moisturize your skin 1 hour before you apply the tattoo. 
- Use the primer wipe included in your kit before applying your tattoo. 
- Apply your tattoo in a comfortable room temperature.
- Don't apply your tattoo on areas of the body that will move or crease (e.g. elbow).
- Stay as still as possible for the hour while the applicator is on your skin.

templates.name: Why is the pocket stitched together on my item?
templates.content: Until you've decided you're sure about the garment, a basting stitch serves as a temporary support during garment production, ensuring its integrity. You might spot these stitches in certain products we offer. To remove from the outside of the garment, carefully break the stitches at the pocket opening with your hands, scissors, or a seam ripper, before removing all loose threads from the front and back of the garment.  Alternatively, you can turn the garment inside out, locating the threads that correspond to the location of the front pocket. Then, pull on the threads to 'break' the stitch and pull out.

templates.name: What makes Glamnetic's Full Volume Lash Enhancing Serum different from other serums?

Glamnetic's Full Volume Lash Enhancing Serum's performance not only rivals but surpasses that of the leading serum in the market! We've worked with the industry's leading chemists for two years to formulate a clinically non-irritating and naturally derived formula. Furthermore, we have carefully infused the serum with clinically backed ingredients at the most effective concentrations, ensuring unmatched results. 

Our serum is a game-changer for achieving lashes that appear longer, thicker, and stronger. Its cutting-edge performance-based ingredients in the formula, clinically tested and made with 99% natural ingredients, ensure remarkable results.  Additionally, our formula is prostaglandin-free which is known to cause the skin to darken around the area of application!

templates.name: Can I use the soothe bath soak as a cleanser in the shower too?

It's formulated to hydrate the skin from head to toe, without causing vulvar or vaginal irritation in the shower or as you soak. Avoid using loofas, washcloths, or other detergents in the vulvar area, especially when experiencing sensitivity as a result of shifts due to menopause.

templates.name: How many milligrams of Melatonin is in one dose (two pills)?
templates.content:
Thanks for reaching out to NightWise®. Here is the answer to your Melatonin question. 

Regular Strength - 2.5 mg in one dose (2 capsules)
Of the total 2.5 mg of Melatonin in our Regular Strength, we release 1.5 mg of Melatonin immediately to help you fall asleep, along with Casein Decapeptide, Magnesium, and L-tryptophan. Then, two hours later, we gradually deliver the remaining 1 mg of Melatonin over four hours to help you stay asleep, along with Valerian Root, Lemon Balm, Hops, and Magnolia.

Extra Strength - 5 mg in one dose (2 capsules)
Of the total 5 mg of Melatonin in our Extra Strength, we release 2.5 mg of Melatonin immediately to help you fall asleep, along with Casein Decapeptide, Magnesium, and L-tryptophan. Then, two hours later, we gradually deliver the remaining 2.5 mg of Melatonin over four hours to help you stay asleep, along with Valerian Root, Lemon Balm, Hops, and Magnolia.

We hope this helps clear up your question about Melatonin. Please let us know if you need anything else.

templates.name: When can I start taking Clairvee and why only 15 days?
templates.content:
You can start any day. It's a once-daily oral capsule that only needs to be taken for 15 consecutive days each month, given its uniquely powerful formulation. The remaining days are 'off' until next month, but probiotic protection continues even on the days you're not taking it, providing month-long protection. 

A 15-day supply will be shipped at the same time every month to make it easy for you to incorporate Clairvee into your routine. Continue using it each month for as long as you want to maintain a healthy vaginal microbiome and prevent symptoms of vaginal imbalance. Note that this product should be taken orally and not inserted into the vagina.

templates.name: Are your essential oils safe to ingest?
templates.content:
We do not give recommendations for ingestion as the body can safely absorb essential oils by topical application or diffusion. All of our oils are 100% pure, natural, and authentic.

If you do choose to ingest the oils, we suggest consulting an aromatherapist or trusted health professional for guidance. As a company we can't provide dosing suggestions or directions on how to ingest if you choose to do so.

templates.name: How full should my jar be filled with wax?
templates.content: The wax should be poured to the widest point of the jar. If you have a container that is egg-shaped or is much wider in the middle than at the top, you may notice that the wax shrinks down some on top. When you're filling into the smaller neck of the container, the top of the wax will tend to cool faster than the middle because it has a smaller surface area, and it will tend to shrink in the center.

templates.name: What is retinol?
templates.content: Retinoid is a category of Vitamin A derivatives. The type of retinol you typically see on the market can be categorized into different families of retinoids. There is prescription strength retinol, such as Tretinoin, that can only be received through a dermatologist. The other family of retinol is cosmetic grade retinol, such as the Laneige Retinol Firming Cream Treatment. We use cosmetic grade retinol to create a gentle, yet effective treatment suitable for beginners.

templates.name: How does my Blueland subscription kit work?
templates.content: It's simple! First, pick which product you'd like to purchase--The Clean Suite, The Clean Essentials Kit, Hand Soap Duo, Dish Duo, or Laundry Essentials. Then, choose how often you'd like refills to be delivered to you, in addition, once you've placed an order for your first subscription kit, you can choose different cadences for each component. templates.name: Bedding: What’s the difference between the Standard Fill and the Extra Fill comforters? Which one should I choose?
templates.content: Most people find the Standard Fill to be the perfect temperature and weight. It reduces humidity that makes us feel too hot or cold and instead stays warm, dry, and cozy all night long. For our customers who are extremely cold-natured, live in a drafty home, sleep with the thermostat below 60 degrees, or live in a particularly cold climate may want to consider an Extra Fill Comforter since it has 30% more filling and has a nice bump of insulation. Keep in mind you have 100 days to try it out. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund or exchange it.

templates.name: Can I take Butyrate in place of probiotics
templates.content: We recommended using food(s) to get probiotics and supplement only when needed (ie for post-antibiotic use). Butyrate is not used in place of probiotics but is used for improving gut health.

templates.name: What kind of 3rd party testing do you do?
templates.content: Every blend is carefully made in a GMP-certified facility. It then moves into strict third-party testing to guarantee each batch is free of heavy metals, aerobic platelets, E. coli, salmonella, pesticides, herbicides, and fungicides. Finally, our blends are tested once more to earn the coveted labels of USDA organic, certified glyphosate-residue free, non-GMO verified, vegan, and certified gluten-free.

templates.name: Brush-On Shield SPF 50 Bronze: Face shield bronze is better
templates.content: Happy to hear you enjoy our Face Shield products! However, these are difficult to compare as Face Shield Bronze is a liquid formulation that offers more intense radiance without the shimmer, leaving skin with a dewy finish. The Brush-On Shield Bronze is a powder formulation which offers a convenient, on-the go application of both SPF and radiance. The shimmer particles in the Brush-On Shield Bronze provide a more subtle and buildable luminosity than Face Shield Bronze which leaves a silky finish.

templates.name: My suede leather item has marks or wrong discoloration
templates.content:
Suede leather is made from the underside of the animal hide, giving it a soft, fuzzy texture made of little fibers. The way these fibers are arranged can alter the material's appearance. For instance, when the nap is flattened, it causes more light to be reflected off the surface. This causes the area to look lighter. When the nap is raised, less light is reflected off the material. This causes the area to look darker. Even though the material is the same color, the angle and direction of the fibers cause these visual shifts, especially noticeable in dark colors like black or dark brown.

This is a normal characteristic for suede leather and can be resolved by brushing the suede using a suede brush or dry towel. This will help to restore the nap on your footwear and create the desired effect.

templates.name: What does it mean when a package is carbon neutral?
templates.content: When a package is carbon neutral it means that there was not any net new carbon produced when that package was shipped and delivered to its final destination. Any package emits carbon on it's journey to your door, especially when it's being transported via delivery truck, air, or freight. A carbon neutral package doesn't emit any excess carbon because the carbon created from shipping this package is offset by purchasing carbon offsets that fund carbon offsetting projects.

templates.name: Based on the picture, what would the embroidery cost be?
templates.content: The logo price is based on the stitch count it takes to do the logo at $1 per thousand stitches, and it generally ranges from $5-$10 (+/-) per item, plus the cost of the item itself and shipping costs. We would need the stitch file to give a specific answer. We can do some custom designs, and there'll be a one-time digitizing fee of $30 charged for the work-up of the logo. Future orders with the same logo don't get charged this fee. Our current lead time is about 2-3 weeks depending on where the items are located. If you'd like us to work up a quote, please email us at newsales@epicsports.com or give us a call at 888-269-2440. templates.name: What is the difference between a tow strap and a recovery strap?
templates.content: A tow strap is designed not to stretch, which makes towing a vehicle at a constant speed easier. A recovery strap is designed to stretch so the rescue vehicle can get a little momentum before the strap goes taut and pulls the stuck vehicle free.

templates.name: What does "flash point" mean?
templates.content: Flash point is the temperature at which a fragrance can ignite when it comes in contact with an ignition source such as an open flame or a spark. It's still perfectly safe to heat a fragrance higher than its flash point, provided there is no ignition source. Flash point is very important when using fragrances in gel candles. Most gel manufacturers recommend using a non-polar fragrance with a flash point of at least 170° F. You can find the flash point of each fragrance listed on the individual fragrance oil page.

templates.name: I have allodynia. Can I use CEFALY treatments?
templates.content:
Allodynia is a condition involving increased sensitivity to touch. People with allodynia may perceive painful sensations from objects or items that do not typically cause pain. Allodynia can affect your tolerance of nerve stimulation treatments.

If you experience allodynia, you should discuss these symptoms with your healthcare provider before starting CEFALY treatments. We recommend people with allodynia become familiar with the intensity stabilization function before using the CEFALY device.
